title: Creative Manager
description:
Please note that Galactic Fed does not engage in any form of recruitment that involves the solicitation of money or personal information from applicants during the recruitment process. Official job offers or any other recruitment communication can only come from careers@galacticfed.com
  
Responsibilities


**Job Type:** Full-time, 40 hours per week, 160 hours per month  

**Location:** Remote  

**Work Schedule:** Working hours must overlap with EST business hours (9am - 5pm EST) for at least five hours each day. We expect team members, especially client-facing, to be available 9am - 5pm EST (New York Time). As a Creative Strategist, you will be responsible for developing and executing creative strategies that drive exceptional results for our clients. You will collaborate closely with our team of designers, ensuring that creative concepts align with our clients’ objectives and resonate with their target audiences. Your expertise in managing a creative team and your proﬁciency in working across multiple advertising platforms, including TikTok, Meta, Google Ads, and others, will be invaluable in this role. Candidates who also have additional experience in organic social strategy, content & copy will have a distinct advantage.
* **Creative Strategy:** Develop innovative and data-driven creative strategies that align with client objectives and deliver outstanding results.
* **Team Leadership:** Hire, manage and lead a team of designers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support to ensure the delivery of high-quality creative work.
* **Advertising Platform Expertise:** Utilize your extensive experience in working with various advertising platforms, including TikTok, Meta, Google Ads, LinkedIn and other platforms to create tailored and effective creative campaigns.
* **Client Collaboration:** Collaborate closely with clients to understand their goals and objectives, and translate them into creative solutions that drive engagement and conversions.
* **Analytics and Optimization:** Monitor campaign performance and use data-driven insights to optimize creative strategies for maximum impact.
* **Cross-Functional Collaboration:** Work collaboratively with our paid media, CRO, email marketing, and SEO teams to ensure a cohesive and integrated approach to client campaigns.


Requirements


* Proven experience as a Creative Strategist, Creative Manager, or a similar role.
* Strong leadership skills with a track record of managing and mentoring creative teams.
* Proﬁciency in working with various advertising platforms, including TikTok, Meta, Google Ads, and others.
* Creative portfolio showcasing successful campaigns across different channels.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills.
* Attention to detail and the ability to multitask in a deadline-driven atmosphere.
* Ability to clearly and effectively articulate insights and recommended actions.
* Strong levels of integrity, autonomy, and self-motivation.
* Excellent analytical, organizational, and time management skills.
* Candidate must be able to commit to hyper-growth and to a long-term work engagement, must be gritty, must be emotionally intelligent, and must be an A-player.

**Notice on Reference Checks:**  

At Galactic Fed, we have found that past working relationships are often the best predictors of future success. Accordingly, we reserve the right to contact managers, direct reports, and colleagues at your previous places of employment for references, regardless of whether or not you share those people with us. To be clear, we will never contact anyone at your current employer without your permission, only past employers. If you have questions or concerns about this, please let us know in advance.

title: Senior Manager, Website Marketing - Remote
description:
Clari’s Revenue platform gives forecasting accuracy and visibility from the sales rep to the board room on revenue performance - helping them spot revenue leak to answer if they will meet, beat, or miss their sales goals. With insights like this, no wonder leading companies worldwide, including Okta, Adobe, Workday, and Zoom use Clari to drive revenue accuracy and precision. We never get tired of our customers singing our praises because it fuels us to help them continue to achieve remarkable. The next generation of revenue excellence is here…are you ready to achieve remarkable with us? **About the Team**
The Marketing team's mission at Clari is to lead the company and the market by defining and dominating our category. Our team's purview spans all things marketing — product marketing, demand gen, content, events, brand, AR/PR, ops — as well as our outbound engine, competitive, enablement, and value engineering. We're responsible not just for creating high-velocity pipeline, but also the programs and trainings that help turn pipeline into revenue. **About the Role**
We are looking for a Senior Manager, Website Marketing to spearhead our global web strategy and presence. Our ideal candidate is an experienced B2B or B2C SaaS website leader who is a blend of web expert, data-driven marketer, growth hacker, and expert project manager.  

In this role, you will lead the web strategy and performance execution with a dedicated team and budget. You will be responsible for creating and executing our organic web strategy. You will bring rigor and business acumen to metrics and reporting to demonstrate the value and impact of our digital marketing programs as they pertain to our web presence and will continuously identify opportunities to improve the website experience and conversions. You will work closely with growth marketing, product marketing, content producers, corporate communications, designers, marketing operations and agencies to proactively prioritize and execute new web projects.  

This role is perfect for those who can run an end-to-end web team focused on performance. Web is Clari’s primary channel and as a result is the center of many new ideas and experiments from all parts of the business. *This is a fully remote opportunity and can be worked from any location in the United States.*
### **Responsibilities**

* Web Strategy - Define and champion a comprehensive strategy for leveraging the website as a key driver for pipeline generation, conversion, and increased ARR
* Performance Orientation - Clearly understand site performance, analyze trends, business results, and use this data to develop new actions to improve performance
* Brand Building - Create a strong online presence for Clari that fuels our growth, builds the brand, and educates and guides visitors at all stages of the decision-making cycle
* Project Management - Construct and execute a roadmap for web projects, ensuring timely delivery and prioritization based on impact. Establish efficient processes that keep the business informed of project outcomes
* Agency Management - Manage external agencies and service providers to support web projects as needed
* Cross-Functional Collaboration - Growth Marketing, Content Marketing, Campaigns, Product Marketing, Corporate Communications, and external agencies. Align web strategies with key business initiatives, delivering data-driven solutions to meet diverse stakeholder needs
* Marketing Ops Collaboration - Collaborate with Marketing Ops to optimize the website for an enhanced user experience and demand generation. Utilize A/B and user testing, personalization, ABM, and CRO strategies to achieve measurable improvements
* CMS Ownership - Take the reins of Clari's CMS, overseeing the creation of new web pages and implementing changes as required to keep content fresh and engaging
* SEO - Oversee our SEO strategy and performance initiatives to increase website traffic globally. Share comprehensive website and SEO growth metrics to showcase success
* Tech Stack Optimization - Manage and optimize a cutting-edge website tech stack. Conduct RFPs, evaluate tech options, and handle contract renewals to ensure a best-in-class toolkit
* Innovative Initiatives - Pioneer new initiatives leveraging intent data sources, ChatGPT-enabled tools, and integrating buyer portals to enhance overall performance
* Team Leadership - Lead and manage a dynamic team consisting of a website developer and SEO specialist, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment. Your leadership will be instrumental in achieving team success

### **Qualifications**

* 6+ years of B2B or B2C website marketing or website optimization experience
* Proven ability to lead website engagement and conversion strategies as well as implement tactical requirements
* Experience effectively leading and managing a team
* Understanding of SEO and information architecture
* Experience managing external resource relationships (agency or contractor)
* Evidence of ability to evaluate and utilize the latest web best practices & technology
* Strong analytical, growth marketing mindset with strong affinity for data analysis & insights
* Excellent ability to drive qualitative and quantitative research, testing, and analysis, synthesize actionable insights and present clear recommendations
* Service-oriented with outstanding problem-solving and project management skills
* Hands-on website CMS management
* Deep knowledge of Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and Google Search Console
* Familiarity with marketing technologies such as Marketo, Salesforce, etc. is ideal
* Familiarity with web optimization technologies such as VWO and Contentsquare is ideal
* Self-motivated individual with a high level of enthusiasm, resourcefulness, and a sense of urgency to deliver remarkable results
* Experience at a SaaS company preferred

### **Perks and Benefits @ Clari**

* Remote-first with opportunities to work and celebrate in person
* Medical, dental, vision, short & long-term disability, Life insurance, and EAP
* Mental health support provided by Modern Health
* Pre-IPO stock options
* Well being and professional development funds
* Retirement 401(k) plan
* 100% paid parental leave, plus fertility and family planning support provided by Maven
* Discretionary paid time off, monthly ‘take a break’ days, and Focus Fridays
* Focus on culture: Charitable giving match, plus in-person and virtual events

  

It is Clari’s intent to pay all Clarians competitive wages and salaries that are motivational, fair, and equitable. The goal of Clari’s compensation program is to be transparent, attract potential employees, meet the needs of all current employees and encourage employees to stay and grow at Clari.  

Actual compensation packages are based on several factors that are unique to each candidate, including but not limited to specific work location, skill set, depth of experience, education and certifications.  

The salary range for this position is $150,000 to $225,000. The compensation package for this position also includes stock options and company-paid benefits, including well-being and professional development stipends.
#BI-Remote
#LI-Remote  

You’ll often hear our CEO talk about being remarkable. To Clari, remarkable means many things. We believe in providing interesting and meaningful work in a nurturing and inclusive environment. One that is free from discrimination for everyone without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, gender identity, or veteran status. Efforts have to be recognized. Voices have to be heard. And work-life balance has to be baked into the very fiber of the company. We are honored to be recognized by Inc. Magazine and Bay Area News Group as a best place to work for several years running. We’d love to have you join us on our journey to remarkable! **If you feel you don’t meet 100% of the qualifications outlined above, we want you to apply! Clari believes in hiring people, not just skills. If you are passionate about learning and excited about what we are doing, then we want to hear from you.**  

Clari focuses on culture add, not culture fit. One of our values is One with Customers, and we know we can serve them better when we involve as many different perspectives as possible. Our team is made stronger by what makes you unique, so we hope you’ll bring your whole self to the job.

title: Product Marketing Director
description:
Garner's mission is to transform the healthcare economy, delivering high quality and affordable care for all. By helping employers restructure their healthcare benefit to provide clear incentives and data-driven insights, we direct employees to higher quality and lower cost healthcare providers. The result is that patients get better health outcomes while doctors are rewarded for practicing well, not performing more procedures. We are backed by top-tier venture capital firms, are growing rapidly and looking to expand our team.


We are looking for an experienced and versatile **Product Marketing Director** to lead our marketing team's product marketing team focused on content, product marketing, customer marketing, and sales enablement. This role is a critical part of the marketing leadership team and will be instrumental in designing and owning significant parts of our go-to-market strategy. As part of this role, you'll be regularly collaborating with the executive leadership team.


### **Responsibilities will include:**


* Enable our customer-facing teams with material that makes each one of them an expert; improving rep ramp times, deal velocity, and win rates.
* Foster customer relationships, maximize customer referenceability, and produce high quality customer reference material that is loved and used regularly by our team.
* Evolve our messaging and positioning frameworks with a focus towards differentiation in the market.
* Develop a content generation engine focused on evangelizing our key messages and always be exploring new formats for communication.
* Create content and messaging themes for the calendar year and align marketing activities around those themes.
* Lead and inspire a team of product marketers, content creators, editors, and strategists, fostering a culture of creativity and excellence in content production.
* Establish and enforce accountability frameworks to ensure team members meet deliverables and adhere to content quality standards.
* Create and maintain a framework for measuring and delivering success, including setting clear goals, metrics, and processes for continuous improvement.
* Ensure all messaging and content is on-brand, consistent in style, quality, and tone, and optimized for different channels and target audiences.
* Collaborate with other departments for a cohesive and integrated approach to content, aligning with overall company initiatives.
* Utilize prospect/customer/industry feedback, data, and analytics to guide messaging and content decisions, optimizing for audience engagement and evangelism.
* Create an industry knowledge center of excellence for employees and customers.

### **Ideal candidate has:**


* Relevant persona and product experience in the healthcare benefits and HR technology space and the ability to understand the creatively engage key audiences.
* A proven ability to execute strategically with a focus on measurable outcomes, building and developing a high-performing team in a fast-growing SaaS company.
* Success leading product marketing and/or content marketing in a multi-product SaaS company with a focus on new categories and category evangelism.
* Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, capable of engaging effectively with a variety of stakeholders.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines.
* A strong sense of ownership and accountability, with a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
* Self-starter with an entrepreneurial mentality and experience working on complex, ambiguous, and fast-moving projects across multiple teams
* A strong sense of compelling storytelling that can turn complex product information into concrete value propositions that emotionally resonate with our audience.
* A willingness to "roll up your sleeves" and do whatever is necessary to ensure company success
* Experience working in a rapidly evolving startup environment .
* A desire to be a part of our mission to improve the U.S. healthcare system.

### **What we look for at Garner:**


* Mission First: Our mission is to transform our healthcare system, delivering high quality and affordable care to all. Everything else is secondary.
* Expect Extraordinary: Our mission is audacious, so we will only succeed by producing exceptional results. We continually push ourselves and each other to new heights and beyond our comfort zones.
* Courageous Communication: Transparency and candor are imperative to realizing our potential as an organization and as individuals—even when uncomfortable. Many companies talk about these values. We live them.
* Supportive community: We know that people do their best work and learn the most when they feel genuinely supported and cared for. It's also more fun that way.


*The target salary range for this position is: $140,000, - $170,000. Individual compensation for this role will depend on a variety of factors including qualifications, skills and applicable laws. In addition to base compensation this role is eligible to participate in our equity incentive and competitive benefits plans.*


*Garner Health is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, reproductive health decisions, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, genetic information, political views or activity, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.*

*Garner Health is committed to providing accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities in our recruiting process. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at* *talent@getgarner.com.*

title: Visual Content Manager
description:
As a leading online store in spirituality, Mindful Souls has become the go-to for all things crystals and personal growth. We aim to demystify the world of mindfulness, making it accessible and easy-to-understand for everyone.



Our company partners with **Shop LC**, another brand in a global portfolio of VGL Group. Established in 2007, Shop LC has grown its reach into over 80-million full-time equivalent U.S. TV households. Their value-conscious, interactive omnichannel business model focuses on fine jewelry, beauty, fashion, home decor, and lifestyle products with continued growth in product offerings. Both households and a full e-commerce engine, offer a robust experience for customers 24/7/365 days a year. Shop LC strives to be the most educational and fun shopping network in the industry with a diversified programming/show schedule refreshed daily.
  

  

Due to the significant growth in digital channels, Shop LC is going to accelerate this transformation to the next level by hiring a **Visual Content Manager****.**

  

**Role overview:**

  


The Visual Content Department is the central hub for organising photo, video, and audio resources catering to diverse needs. Approximately 70% of the content is channeled towards supporting our ads team, 20% is dedicated to fuelling our social media presence, and the remaining content is distributed among websites and brand managers. Our department plays a pivotal role in shaping the content visible across our websites, advertisements, and social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram and TikTok.

 *This is a remote role, with daily collaboration with Shop LC headquarters in Austin, US.*

  

**Your responsibilities will include:**

  

* Lead a team by overseeing tasks, tracking KPIs, and ensuring alignment with company goals.
* Manage content requests from inception to execution, including brief creation, creator selection, acquisition, and revision oversight.
* Assess content quality, relevance, and adherence to brand standards using a systematic rating system.
* Foster cross-departmental collaboration to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
* Handle critical decision-making processes and operational adjustments.
* Manage budgets and resource allocation, ensure the financial transparency through reporting.
* Drive departmental advancement strategies, enhancing content standards and performance.

 **Must-haves:**

  

* Experience in facilitating and executing content specifically for advertising and marketing in the online retail industry.
* Track record in the e-Commerce company, including projects for commercials and social media channels.
* Strong skills in overseeing end-to-end content creation processes, ensuring both quality and timely delivery.
* Experience motivating and guiding teams toward common goals.
* Ability to organise and manage diverse visual content effectively.
* Proven skills in tackling challenges during content creation and distribution.
* Experience working with cross-functional teams for content integration.
* Ability to spot opportunities to innovate content creation processes.

 **What we will appreciate:**

  

* Experience in a similar position, in a brand selling lifestyle accessories (fashion, jewellery, etc.)
* Proven skills to connect efficiently with teams and collaborators.

  

If you are passionate and ready to elevate our content strategy to impact the sales funnels and customer acquisition, this is the opportunity you've been waiting for. Join the team and make your own contribution to Shop LC growth!

title: Social Media Content Manager
description:
**About Appen**  

Appen is a leader in AI enablement for critical tasks such as model improvement, supervision, and evaluation. To do this we leverage our global crowd of over one million skilled contractors, speaking over 180 languages and dialects, representing 130 countries. In addition, we utilize the industry's most advanced AI-assisted data annotation platform to collect and label various types of data like images, text, speech, audio, and video.  

Our data is crucial for building and continuously improving the world's most innovative artificial intelligence systems and Appen is already trusted by the world's largest technology companies. Now with the explosion of interest in generative AI, Appen is helping leaders in automotive, financial services, retail, healthcare, and governments the confidence to deploy world-class AI products.  

At Appen, we are purpose driven. Our fundamental role in AI is to ensure all models are helpful, honest, and harmless, so we firmly believe in unlocking the power of AI to build a better world. We have a learn-it-all culture that values perspective, growth, and innovation. We are customer-obsessed, action-oriented, and celebrate winning together.  

At Appen, we are committed to creating an inclusive and diverse workplace. We are an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.  

Position Overview:
We are seeking a creative and strategic Social Media Content Manager to lead our social media efforts and effectively communicate our brand story across digital channels. The ideal candidate will be passionate about the intersection of data, AI, and technology, with a proven track record of creating engaging and impactful social media content.  

Key Responsibilities:
Content Strategy and Planning:
Develop and execute a comprehensive social media content strategy aligned with the company's overall marketing and brand objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure social media content is aligned with product updates, industry trends, and key company messages.  

Content Creation:
Create compelling and shareable content for various social media platforms, including LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, and others.
Produce a mix of content types, including graphics, videos, infographics, and written posts, to effectively engage target audiences.  

Brand Voice and Messaging:
Ensure consistency in brand voice and messaging across all social media channels.
Craft and refine messaging that resonates with our target audience, highlighting the value of our data solutions and AI applications.  

Community Engagement:
Actively monitor social media channels for industry trends, relevant conversations, and opportunities for engagement.
Foster and grow our social media community by responding to comments, messages, and engaging with followers.  

Campaigns and Promotions:
Collaborate with marketing and demand generation teams to develop and execute social media campaigns that support product launches, events, and other initiatives.
Leverage social media advertising tools to amplify the reach of key campaigns.  

Analytics and Reporting:
Utilize social media analytics tools to track and measure the performance of social media content and campaigns.
Provide regular reports on key performance indicators (KPIs) and insights to inform future content strategy.  

Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field.
Proven experience as a social media content manager, preferably in the technology or data services industry.
Strong understanding of social media platforms, trends, and best practices.
Exceptional creative and storytelling skills. Proficient in graphic design tools and video editing software.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Ability to stay current with industry trends and adapt content strategy accordingly.
Appen is the global leader in data for the AI Lifecycle with more than 25 years’ experience in data sourcing, annotation, and model evaluation. Through our expertise, platform, and global crowd, we enable organizations to launch the world’s most innovative artificial intelligence products with speed and at scale. Appen maintains the industry’s most advanced AI-assisted data annotation platform and boasts a global crowd of more than 1 million contributors worldwide, speaking more than 235 languages. Our products and services make Appen a trusted partner to leaders in technology, automotive, finance, retail, healthcare, and government. Appen has customers and offices globally.

title: Content Marketing Manager
description:
**Team Overview:**  

At Fluency, we come together under two shared passions that drive our culture: the scaling of digital ad operations, and fostering a workplace environment rooted in open communication, inclusivity, and a growth-oriented mindset. These passions not only set us apart in the industry, but also fuel our collective drive to reshape the industry and reinvent ourselves along the way. We're not just revolutionizing the digital advertising horizon, we're shaping an organization where every member feels a sense of pride and is inspired to do their best work.

**Job Summary:**


As the Content Marketing Manager, you’ll be responsible for planning, developing and implementing Fluency’s overall content strategy while also overseeing execution. You will combine a passion for written storytelling and proven ability to write compellingly across digital channels with a strategic mindset and curiosity about the ad tech landscape to help us become the definitive thought leader in our category while driving business results. To accomplish this, you will own our overall editorial calendar and strategy, ensuring that it effectively supports brand awareness, demand generation, and customer success programs across paid, earned, and owned media. You will also leverage your ability to effectively collaborate with - and ghostwrite for - a wide variety of stakeholders, while managing production and delivery targets.

**Your Role:**

* Lead the development and execution of the vision, strategy and budget for all content marketing and growth initiatives
* Produce content for blogs, articles, websites, emails, webinars, social media and other formats.
* Research content performance, customer behavior data and competitors’ strategies.
* Enforce style guidelines, deadlines and budgets for content teams
* Create and manage an editorial calendar
* Review and edit content for social media posts, blogs, white papers, website landing pages and other media.
* Creation of programs and campaigns that engage and grow a user base from signup through conversion, engagement, and advocacy
* Build strong relationships with all respective counterparts including Marketing, Design, Product, Sales, HR and other departments
* Evaluate content performance metrics and make adjustments to content strategy

**What We Look For:**

* Experience writing and editing content for blogs, articles, whitepapers, infographics, emails, ebooks and other media.
* Proven ability to write and/or produce video assets (storyboards, treatments, scripts)
* In-depth understanding of the company's brand voice and how to translate it into content style guidelines
* In-depth knowledge of the HubSpot Content Optimization System.
* Experience in producing smart CTAs according to the visitor lifecycle stage.
* Knowledge of how to enforce content strategies across different teams and departments.
* Emotional intelligence and cognitive flexibility are a must; you’ll be working with a wide variety of personalities and agendas against a sometimes time-challenged backdrop.
* You are Decisive with a capital “D” and can coalesce feedback from multiple sources into clear actions.
* Your ability to judge quality and pay attention to details is balanced with a sixth sense for when something is “done”.
* You have a refined sense of prioritization; can you separate the critical from the merely important
* You are adroitly communicative; you know when to communicate “early and often” while also knowing when (and what) *not* to communicate.
* You’re a quick study with a boundless curiosity for learning.
* Holistic in your intake and understanding and focused in your execution.
* Your sense of timing is impeccable, and similarly, your ability to deliver on time is proven.
* Drive for results - including an understanding of content marketing KPIs and funnel metrics.


**Required Experience:**

* Great person
* Be alive and have passion to join our team
* History of success
* Driven

**Fluency is headquartered in Vermont. This position is remote** **US based****. If local, you have the option to go into the office.***Fluency provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.*


NYDKxOM2kF

title: Demand Generation Manager
description:
SentiLink provides innovative identity and risk solutions, empowering institutions and individuals to transact confidently with one another.

By building the future of identity verification in the United States and reinventing the currently clunky, ineffective, and expensive process, we believe strongly that the future will be 10x better.

We’ve had tremendous traction and are growing extremely quickly. Already our real-time APIs have helped verify hundreds of millions of identities, beginning with financial services. In 2021, we raised a $70M Series B round, led by Craft Ventures to rapidly scale our best in class products. We’ve earned coverage and awards from TechCrunch, CNBC, Bloomberg, Forbes, Business Insider, PYMNTS, American Banker, LendIt, and have landed on the Forbes Fintech 50 in 2023 and 2024. Last but not least, we’ve even been a part of history - we were the first company to go live with the eCBSV and testified before the United States House of Representatives.
### **Role:**



The Demand Generation Manager will report to our Head of Marketing and play a crucial role in driving awareness, engagement, and demand for our fraud and risk solutions. This role will be responsible for creating and executing integrated marketing campaigns that leverage various channels to generate leads and nurture prospects throughout the buyer's journey.



This is a remote, U.S. based role.


### **Responsibilities:**


**Campaign Strategy and Execution:**


* Develop and execute end-to-end demand generation campaigns aligned with business goals and target audience.
* Utilize digital marketing channels, including email, social media, paid advertising, webinars, and content marketing, to drive lead generation.


**Marketing Automation:**


* Leverage marketing automation tools to create and manage targeted and personalized campaigns.
* Implement lead scoring and nurturing processes to optimize the conversion of leads to opportunities.


**Content Development:**


* Collaborate with the content team to create compelling and relevant content for different stages of the buyer's journey.
* Ensure consistent messaging and branding across all demand-generation activities.


**Analytics and Reporting:**


* Monitor and analyze campaign performance using marketing analytics tools.
* Provide regular reports on key performance metrics, identifying areas for improvement and optimization.


**Collaboration:**


* Work closely with the Sales team to understand lead qualification criteria and ensure seamless handoff of marketing qualified leads (MQLs).
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align campaigns with broader marketing initiatives.
* Manage relationships with external agencies and freelancers.

### **Requirements:**


* 4+ years of experience in demand generation, preferably within the B2B technology SaaS industry.
* Experience developing and executing successful demand generation campaigns, resulting in measurable lead generation and revenue growth.
* Proficiency in marketing automation platforms, CRM systems, and analytics tools (experience with platforms such as HubSpot, Salesforce, Google Analytics, digital marketing, and social media management tools is highly desirable.)
* Demonstrated success in planning and executing engaging integrated marketing campaigns.
* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
* Strong project management and organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously and meet deadlines.
* Familiarity with the fraud and risk solutions landscape is a plus.
* Candidates must be legally authorized to work in the United States and must live in the United States

### **Salary Range:**


* $135,000/year - $165,000/year


### **Perks:**


* Employer paid group health insurance for you and your dependents
* 401(k) plan with employer match (or equivalent for non US-based roles)
* Flexible paid time off
* Regular company-wide in-person events
* Home office stipend, and more!

### **Corporate Values:**


* Follow Through
* Deep Understanding
* Whatever It Takes
* Do Something Smart

title: Marketing Content Manager
description:
**About Us:**



We're Helium 10, the leading Software company for Amazon sellers. We move fast, really fast, so we need someone who can keep up. We're experts at our craft (and if not, we become experts, fast!) and we hold each other to a high standard. Why? We're shaping the future for Amazon sellers and our customers deserve the best. We make tough decisions, own up to mistakes, and above all, we find solutions to problems.


**About the role:**



As the Content Marketing Manager, you will be the architect of compelling narratives, creating content that captivates our audience and elevates our brand presence. You will lead a talented team, collaborating across departments to craft and execute content strategies that resonate with our target audience. In this role, you will primarily focus on Helium 10 social media content and events.


**Responsibilities:**


* Develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy aligned with business goals.
* Create an editorial calendar, ensuring timely and consistent content delivery.
* Produce high-quality, engaging content across various channels, including blog posts, articles, social media, and more.
* Collaborate with internal teams and subject matter experts to gather insights for compelling content.
* Lead and inspire a content team, fostering creativity and ensuring alignment with brand voice and messaging.
* Provide guidance on content creation, ensuring a consistent and compelling narrative.
* Analyze audience behavior and preferences to tailor content for maximum engagement.
* Leverage SEO strategies to optimize content for search and increase organic traffic.
* Implement metrics and analytics to measure content performance.
* Use data-driven insights to refine content strategies and maximize effectiveness.


**Skills & Qualifications:**


* Proven experience in content marketing with a strong portfolio of successful campaigns.
* Exceptional writing and editing skills, with an ability to craft compelling and shareable content.
* Strong leadership and team management skills.
* Familiarity with SEO best practices and content optimization.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to derive insights from data.


**Benefits:**


* Unlimited Paid Time Off
* Paid Holidays and Floating Holidays
* Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA/HSA, Life Insurance and Pet Insurance
* 401k with Employer Match
* Take up to 2 Days of Paid Time Off to Volunteer with a 501c Organization
* Paid Parental Leave

 *Helium 10 is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.*

title: Insights Manager, Content and Discovery Analytics
description:
LTK's mission is to empower the world's premium lifestyle Creators to achieve maximum economic success. We have a huge opportunity ahead of us and we're looking for team members who want to create, innovate and disrupt an industry.



We empower our team members to drive innovation, create value, and continue to spearhead the creation of this industry — a game changer when it comes to career growth.

**Title:** Insights Manager | Content and Discovery Analytics



Location: This is a fully remote position. If you are located near one of our LTK offices, come have a coffee when you want to socialize!


**About the role**



LTK's Insights & Analytics team is an integral component of the company's overall mission. As a Manager, you will lead and support the analysis and strategy behind complex business problems. You will work cross-functionally across LTK to provide insights to optimize the business and assess the execution of and impact of initiatives. You will act as a "player-coach" and have a strong ability to balance your desire to "roll-up your sleeves" with your want to mentor and grow your team. You inherently are creative, analytical, and technically proficient with a strong desire to solve problems while balancing the dynamics of business and tech.



In this role, you will be part of a growth-hungry, acceleration-minded team of problem-solvers and product-builders; you will use a data-driven approach to drive a deep understanding of our rapidly evolving business and platforms. We focus relentlessly on the needs of our brands, influencers and consumers. We seek thought-partners and creative thinkers who can collaborate effectively with product managers, marketing managers, designers, and engineers to define and measure success metrics as well as identify actionable insights to help LTK grow.



This role focuses on Content and Discovery Analytics within the LTK Insights & Analytics hub. This person will collaborate to generate actionable insights that impact all areas of the business and ultimately drive engagement and revenue by conducting complex analyses and monitoring performance on a daily basis. You will apply your strategic and analytical skills to high visibility company challenges. You will partner with product teams to develop and test strategies that ultimately impact the bottom line. Other focus areas include:


* Identify business challenges and opportunities for improvement and solve for them using analysis to make strategic or tactical recommendations
* Help build targeted insights to inform the design and development of new customer and creator experiences through content discovery, as well as breakthrough technology and concepts designed to deliver on new go to market strategies
* Involve problem frame-works, develop hypotheses, test and analysis, solution development, scope operational feasibility, lead implementation efforts and develop a monitoring plan


**How you will make an impact**


* Lead a team of analysts to translate complex analytical tasks into actionable insights and easily consumable outputs
* Define and manage processes needed to achieve operational excellence for your team
* Provide guidance and mentorship the members of your team
* Translate complex analytical tasks into actionable insights and easily consumable outputs
* Synthesize complex data analyses and communicate clearly and effectively to stakeholders across the organization
* Be able to extract data out of Big Data technologies (i.e. Redshift) to produce clear and actionable insights
* Craft compelling dashboards and visualizations to "tell the story" of the business
* Continually evaluate and refine your technical toolkit; teach what you learn to the team
* Collaborate daily with cross-functional colleagues to drive strategies and tactics for growth


**What you will bring to LTK**



Qualifications


* 5+ years experience in a quantitative role (ideal backgrounds include: a similar at a paid media agency, e-commerce or travel industry with experience working on Brand and Content Analytics)
* 4+ years of experience managing and scaling a team (2+ persons)
* Proven track record of decision making and problem solving based on analytics. Conceptual thinking skills must be complemented by a strong quantitative orientation to drive actionable insights and decisions
* Strong communication skills - you can present your findings in a clear and articulate way to groups of various stakeholders to drive decision making through interpersonal and negotiation skills
* A self-starter with a curious nature and passion for data; you "think outside the box" and "around the corner" with fierce attention to detail
* A deep desire to prove yourself right or wrong and make smart decisions without ego
* Empathy and intellectual humility to build strong rapport and thought-partnerships with colleagues
* Ability to thrive and adapt in a fast-paced, high-growth, and rapidly changing environment and drive and execute an agenda in an uncertain and fluid environment; you display an intense focus on achieving both short and long term goals (wearing both hats simultaneously)
* Strong math and analytical skills
* Expert at Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets
* Strong SQL skills; experience with Python, R or a similar programming language is a plus
* Proficiency with BI visualization tool (i.e. Looker, Tableau)


**Functional requirements:**


* Bachelor's or Master's degree; your major can be anything - we love diverse educational backgrounds, but you have a strong quantitative foundation
* Demonstrable record of professional and academic achievements
* Experience in building, inspiring, developing and leading a high-performing team
* Ability to influence cross-functional stakeholders (technical and non-technical)

  


**#LI-BN1**


**#LI-Remote**

### **What we offer**


* The opportunity to be part of the leading global company in creator commerce
* A remote-first, productivity-first environment
* Competitive compensation and benefits package to meet the needs of you and your family
* 401(k) with LTK company matching
* Medical Insurance, Vision Insurance, Dental Insurance
* Paid Maternity Leave and Paid Paternity Leave
* Summer Fridays and Flexible PTO

### **About LTK**



Founded in 2011, LTK is the global technology platform purpose-built to empower lifestyle creators to monetize their content. The full-service platform connects brands, creators, and shoppers with a world-class shopping app and trusted tools and technology that make content instantly shoppable. Today, premium lifestyle creators in 160+ countries drive more than $4 billion+ in annual retail sales through their LTK Shop profiles. More than 40 million consumers turn to LTK Shops in the LTK shopping platform each month to find inspiration and instantly shop the styles recommended by their favorite creators. More than 7,000 retailers and 1M brands partner with LTK to gain access to its global creator network for content that converts against performance-driven, cross-channel KPIs. LTK is headquartered in Dallas, TX, and currently operates on five continents.


### **Our mission**



To empower the world's premium lifestyle Creators to achieve maximum economic success.


### **Our values**


* Here to win
* Commit to the journey
* Work well

### **Commitment to diversity**



LTK believes diversity, equity, and inclusion are fundamental obligations that strengthen our team. We employ a diverse, multi-disciplinary team to build a meaningful company and culture.



*For US-Based Roles: We are not offering new sponsorships opportunities at this time for persons requiring employment visas, such as an H-1B; authorization to work in the U.S. is a precondition of employment.*


*Any unsolicited resumes/candidate profiles submitted through our website or to personal email accounts of employees of LTK are considered the property of LTK and are not subject to payment of agency fees*.


*LTK is an Equal Opportunity Employer.* #LI-Remote

title: Video Content Creator
description:
**Remote (Full-Time)**  
LYFE Marketing is seeking an energetic full-time Video Content Creator to film videos for our company’s social media pages. You will be in front of the camera and expected to script and record various marketing videos each week. Then, our video editors will transform your raw footage into amazing content to publish on our social media page. This position is apart of our internal marketing team and the primary goal is to increase our visibility and leads. If you are passionate about content creation and love being in front of the camera, then KEEP READING.  
As a Video Content Creator, you will scripting and recording valuable marketing videos to educate small business owners. You will expected to create engaging content that keeps our audience engaged. You will be responsible for implementing best-practices for social media content creation, which include engaging hooks and quality content that keeps people watching and wanting more. This position involves strong writing and communication skills.  
**Important:** You will not be expected to edit the video content, as we have a video editing team who will do this. Also, we will provide the necessary equipment to film content.

**Insight into LYFE Marketing**  
LYFE Marketing is a leading social media marketing agency with fully remote operations. We recently ranked #299 on the Inc. 5000 list for fastest-growing private companies in the US. Our goal is to help small businesses grow through the use of expert online marketing strategies and execution. We currently offer social media, PPC advertising, and email marketing services. We have been in business for over 10 years while providing affordable and reliable services to small businesses. If you are looking for a job where you’ll be able to help people, businesses, and the economy, LYFE Marketing is the place for you

**Requirements**

* Passionate about Video Content Creation and Social Media
* At least 1-2 Years of Social Media or On-Camera Experience
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Excellent written and grammar skills
* Strong work-ethic
* Ability to learn new concepts quickly
* Ability to understand the needs of our clients and how to cater services to their needs
* Must be proactive and self-motivated
* A proactive, self-motivated team player who is committed to helping the company continue to grow and evolve.

**Education**

* Associate’s or Bachelor’s Degree with an emphasis on business, marketing, or journalism is preferred.

**Experience**

* At least 1-2 years experience in digital marketing required. We will ignore applications that do not have at least 1-2 years experience.

**Compensation, Hours, and Environment**

* **Base Salary:** Based On Experience
* **Bonus:** performance-based bonuses and commissions
* **Hours:** This is a full-time position (40 hours)
* **Environment:** Regular work hours are 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m., with additional hours as required to complete assignments and occasional weekend work.

**Preferences (Additional skills that make you stand out)**

* Broad understanding of Social Media and Content Creation
* Broad understanding of LYFE Marketing’s company and services
* Strong writing and editing abilities
* Any related certifications (Hootsuite, HubSpot, DigitalMarketer, etc. is a plus)
* Any previous management, customer service, or related experience in working with small businesses

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $60,000.00 - $75,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* 401(k)
* Dental insurance
* Health insurance
* Paid time off
* Vision insurance

Schedule:

* 8 hour shift

Work Location: Remote

title: Software Engineering Manager, Content Instructional Engineering
description:
**About Kiddom**  

Kiddom is a groundbreaking educational platform that promotes student equity and growth by uniting high-quality instructional materials with dynamic digital learning. Through unparalleled curriculum management functionality, Kiddom empowers schools and districts to take ownership of their curriculum – resulting in learning experiences tailored to meet the unique needs and goals of local communities. Kiddom’s high-quality curriculum is layered with robust teacher and leader data insights to drive the continuous improvement of instructional decisions, school/district programming, and professional learning. **About the Team**
Kiddom has a strong focus on high quality instructional materials. The Content Instructional Engineering team works with content authors and partners to ingest and optimize content within the Kiddom platform. The team of ingestion engineers and instructional designers (IDs) work together to automate ingestion of new curricula. Using a combination of ingestion tools and AI, engineers pull content from a variety of formats into a standardized Kiddom database, coordinating closely with instructional designers to get the best technical ingestion. Once in the platform, the IDs are able to further tweak and optimize the content for the most interactive and engaging teacher and student experience. **About the Role**
We're looking for a thoughtful and strategic engineering leader to help us to further automate and refine our engineering processes across ingestion and optimization tooling. As we continue to scale our needs for quality curricula, we need to also scale and refine our team capabilities through automation, making sure we have a flexible, repeatable, and maintainable ingestion engine. As a manager on the engineering team, you’ll work closely with our VP of Engineering to execute on product and engineering projects, build out and support your engineering team, and help define Kiddom Engineering as we scale in these coming years. **About You**
You have the engineering skills, empathy, and integrity needed to evaluate and guide the career paths of technically-astute engineers. You are kind, supportive of others, and passionate about helping others develop as software engineers, increasing your impact through their growth. You enjoy the challenge of balancing speed of execution with quality while building a product users love and willing to dive into the code when necessary. You are as enthusiastic about recruiting and building a team as you are about solving challenging technical problems.
### **You will:**

+ Manage a team of full-stack engineers and instructional designers
+ Collaborate with the team's product managers, designers, and other engineers to plan and execute product and engineering roadmaps
+ Coach and mentor engineers for individual impact, balance, growth, and leadership
+ Thoughtfully craft the team's responsibilities, goals, and processes to deliver
+ Collaborate with cross-functional leaders across the organization
+ Build a user-friendly experience, balancing pace with quality

### **You have:**

+ 6+ years of relevant experience, with 3+ years of management
+ Experience working cross-functionally with product management, design, and other engineering teams
+ The intelligence, empathy, integrity, and the technical chops required to quickly earn the trust of a technically astute team
+ Comfort with ambiguity; you enjoy figuring out what needs to be done—and then doing it

$160,000 - $200,000 a year  

Salary range is dependent on geography, past experience, seniority, and demonstrated role related ability during the interview process. **What we offer*** Full time permanent employees are eligible for the following benefits from their first day:
* Competitive salary
* Meaningful equity
* Health benefits: medical (various PPO/HMO/HSA plans), dental, vision, disability and life insurance
* 10 paid sick days per year
* Unlimited vacation time policy (subject to internal approval). Average use 4 weeks off per year.
* Paid family leave after birth/adoption of caretakers and minimum of 16 paid weeks for birthing parents. Meant to supplement benefits offered by State.

 **COVID Vaccination Policy**
Kiddom policy requires employees to be vaccinated before they visit an office or attend company events..
We have remote roles but in certain positions where office attendance is deemed to be essential to the role, offers of employment shall be conditional upon proof of vaccination.

title: Content Producer & Social Media Manager
description:
#### **About the Position**


1Digital Agency is a nationally recognized e-commerce digital marketing agency that has excelled in web design, development, and digital marketing since 2012. Our company has produced over 300 custom websites for eCommerce businesses worldwide and is an elite development partner of BigCommerce, Shopify, and other national e-commerce platforms.


Our company is expanding fast, and we need your help to grow in our eCommerce SEO & Social department. You can check us out at 1DigitalAgency.com.


We are looking for someone who is passionate about producing quality content, that can help with coordination of copy from various writers, as well as a person that likes to mix it up with Social Media, engagement, copywriting and creative thinking.


This is a full-time position with a competitive salary, great benefits / paid time off. This position is fully remote.


#### **Your Objectives**


* Produce quality content for clients including website copy, SEO copy, and email blasts
* Ability to write clear, engaging and consistent messaging with the company’s target audience in mind
* Work with external writing team members and help with content coordination, including checking for quality
* Execute social media strategy and best practices across various social media channels – Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.
* Work with account managers to develop lead generation strategies through social media
* Communicate directly with users via social channels, responding to questions, engaging and being the voice of 1Digital®
* Come up with creative ideas to help enhance 1Digital® social strategy, email campaigns

#### **What’s in your arsenal:**


* Excellent creative writing ability
* SEO experience is a plus
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Knowledge of social media platforms as well as social media management platforms
* College degree preferred

title: Sr. Product Manager, ML Research
description:
Runway is a research company pioneering new tools for human imagination. Runway has been at the forefront of multi-modal AI systems ensuring that the future of content creation is accessible, controllable and empowering for creatives. Runway’s mission is to ensure that anyone anywhere can tell their stories. We believe that deep learning techniques applied to audiovisual content will forever change art, creativity, and design tools.



Runway is leading a shift to generative media that is unlocking an unprecedented level of creative potential. The invention of the camera 200 years ago forever changed our world – AI is a new kind of camera that will reshape storytelling forever and lead to full feature films that are entirely generated.


### **About the role**



We’re looking for a passionate Senior Product Manager to help us develop cutting-edge AI tools. This role is for someone who has a combination of strong technical or ML background and experience in product management. You have the ability to take the state-of-the-art AI systems our research team builds and turn them into impactful tools for our customers.



You’ll deeply understand what users want, what’s possible to build, and what’s strategic for our business. You’ll be a bridge between our users and our internal teams so we ship products that have the most value for Runway’s creators.



This role is a fundamental and critical part of the team for a market-defining company in its early stages.


### **What you’ll do**


* Work alongside our research team to define new AI applications that solve customer needs and drive business value
* Collaborate closely with engineering and design to productize research and continuously improve existing tools
* Define and analyze metrics, talk with users weekly, and conduct A/B tests to discover use cases, validate pain points, and prioritize features

### **What you’ll need**


* 1+ years of experience in an industry or academic role as a software engineer or researcher with direct coding experience
* 3+ years of product management experience
* Familiarity with the current state-of-the-art ML capabilities and ML products
* Experience working with fast-moving teams and building products from scratch
* Passion for seeing research through from initial conception to ultimate application
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills


Runway strives to recruit and retain exceptional talent from diverse backgrounds while ensuring pay equity for our team. Our salary ranges are based on competitive market rates for our size, stage and industry, and salary is just one part of the overall compensation package we provide.



There are many factors that go into salary determinations, including relevant experience, skill level and qualifications assessed during the interview process, and maintaining internal equity with peers on the team. The range shared below is a general expectation for the function as posted, but we are also open to considering candidates who may be more or less experienced than outlined in the job description. In this case, we will communicate any updates in the expected salary range.



Lastly, the provided range is the expected salary for candidates in the U.S. Outside of those regions, there may be a change in the range, which again, will be communicated to candidates.



Salary range: $160,000-$200,000


### **Working at Runway**


**Great things come from great teams.** **We’d love to hear from you.**



We’re committed to creating a space where our employees can bring their full selves to work and have equal opportunity to succeed. So regardless of race, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, origin, ability, age, veteran status, if joining this mission speaks to you, we encourage you to apply.



More about Runway


* Runway Research
* Runway's AI Film Festival
* Creative Dialogues Series
* Runway Studios
* Our Behaviors and Company Mission
* We raised a $141 million extension to our Series C


We're excited to be recognized as a best place to work Crain's | InHerSight | BuiltIn NYC | INC

title: Marketer
description:
**About the Role:**
-------------------


**Star Sports is the leading sports broadcaster in India. It offers a wide variety of sports content, broadcasting all major sports events such as IPL, ICC, Premier League, Pro Kabaddi, Wimbledon etc. Star Sports has redefined sports broadcasting in India with extensive cricket coverage, including domestic and international matches. It also offers several regional channels in different languages to cater to the diverse linguistic audience in India. We serve high quality content to millions of customers with world class technology and production. We are now seeking an individual to join our dynamic marketing team. This position is responsible for handling strategy & marketing plans for sports & grassroots initiatives like Khelo India Youth Games.**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Context:**
------------


**Star Sports is a key catalyst in espousing a multisport culture in India. Over the past 5 years, it has invested in and partnered with key stakeholders to popularize sports beyond Cricket. You will play a crucial role in supporting the smooth functioning of our organization. Your focus will be to grow viewership of the event on TV and to deepen engagement with light, medium and heavy consumers of the sport/event. The role will also oversee marketing efforts to recruit new viewers into the fold of the sport/event.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Key Responsibilities:**
-------------------------

* **Data Analysis: Assimilating and analyzing viewership trends, triggers and barriers for viewership for each property/event & ratifying different hypothesis basis the data analysis with the help of primary or secondary research where applicable.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Insight Development: Developing actionable insights into effective product, media, and communication plans.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Goal Setting: Developing and aligning the key goals for the marketing task ranging from awareness targets, intention to watch targets, media reach targets and viewership targets (TVR/event reach/frequency/consumption)**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Planning & Project Management: Planning and executing marketing plans for the key properties. Working with diverse and multi-functional project teams to manage end to end delivery of marketing plans for the different properties.**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Marketing Communications: Developing clear briefs for the various properties/events as per the aligned goals/deliverables. Briefing the internal and external creative teams and clearly articulating the insights, potential campaign spaces and delivery expectations. Aligning the approach and finalization of the marketing communication plan (which should cover own media, paid media, digital, social, activations & programming) for the event. Driving the execution of individual plans along with a clear cascade plan which captures the on-air dates for all the different tactical elements of the marketing plan.**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Campaign Execution: Working closely with Internal and External partners: Advertising agencies, media planners and media partners (Radio/Print/TV channels), research agencies, activation agencies, social and digital agencies, production houses/partners, Bollywood, and music studios. Developing 360 degree digital and communication plans through collaboration with key stakeholders: programming/content, ad-sales, distribution and internal corporate communications team. Assisting in planning and managing yearly multi-crore budgets in paid media and Star owned media for large impact properties.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Project tracking and review: Tracking the deliverables against the aligned goals/targets and crystallizing action points to be corrected in the next event.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Performance Measures:**
-------------------------

* **Viewership targets.**
-----------------------
* **Ideation and innovation.**
----------------------------
* **Cross functional collaboration**
----------------------------------

**Qualifications:**
-------------------

* **Qualification: MBA (Top-tier B-School)**
------------------------------------------
* **4 - 6 years of core marketing/brand experience and experience in driving ATL/BTL plans for large national consumer brands.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Personal Attributes:**
------------------------

* **Understanding of marketing principles, media planning, consumer research, ATL/BTL campaign development.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Taking initiative and leading/managing teams.**
-------------------------------------------------
* **Clarity of thoughts in strategic initiatives.**
-------------------------------------------------
* **Sports Aficionado.**
----------------------

**About Star Sports :**
-----------------------

**The Star Sports Network is home to several leading domestic and international sports with 17 channels broadcasting premier sporting events which include cricket coverage under the purview of the TATA Indian Premier League (IPL), International Cricket Council (ICC), Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), Cricket South Africa and Asian Cricket Council (ACC); VIVO Pro Kabaddi; Football under Hero Indian Super League (ISL), Premier League; and Wimbledon amongst others.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: Brand Manager
description:
**About this Opportunity**

 **Key Responsibilities:**  

In this role, you would be responsible for all the brand marketing activities for redBus india Bus business  

We are looking for someone who is extremely passionate about consumer insights, championing the consumer and brand strategy with the ability to craft integrated marketing plans for Digital, ATL & BTL working in tandem with external agency partners and internal stakeholders. We are looking for someone with a consumer-first mind-set with a keen interest to attribute marketing efforts with business impact, and hence be comfortable with the creative, media and business dimensions of marketing. Another important attribute would be to have an ability to think about brand beyond communication and be a part of the entire journey to develop a holistic brand experience across consumer touch points.  

You would be responsible for **Brand Development:*** Developing and implementing innovative & creative marketing strategies aligned with the overall brand & marketing strategy of redBus India.
* Planning, executing, and tracking the performance of marketing campaigns across digital, ATL, and BTL media.
* Media Strategy and Execution: Translating brand objectives into media strategy and go-to-market media plans. Executing and optimizing media plans with the media agency (digital-first thinking).
* Conducting research on market trends, audiences, competitors, and end-to-end consumer journeys to drive engagements and conversions.
* Working closely with external agencies, influencers, and content creators for effective campaign execution and to drive brand visibility and engagement across platforms.
* Optimizing and analyzing campaign execution spends in accordance with expected revenue and impact on media, brand, and business metrics.

 **Execution and Tracking:*** Execution Excellence: Collaborating closely with the agency, revenue, and brand lead to closely track, manage, and report campaign performance.
* Measuring and reporting performance with comprehensive pre, mid, and post-campaign analysis and assessing ROI with predefined KPIs.
* Ensuring quick turnaround on critical deliverables.
* Demonstrating excellent negotiation skills with vendors to ensure quality, timely delivery, and cost-control.
* Tracking all vendor invoices and payments (pending and delivered).
* Working with the in-house creative team to efficiently deliver artwork for collateral and campaign communication elements.
* Driving the marketing planning & calendar, and activations across ATL, BTL, PR, and Digital.
* Collaborating effectively with cross-functional stakeholders (Product, Supply, etc.) to ensure full support from relevant teams in executing strategy.

 **Educational Qualification:** MBA in marketing or equivalent degree **Years of Experience :** Having 0-3 years of relevant work experience in managing and handling marketing campaigns end to end (from conception, budgeting to execution and tracking performance). Preferably in a new age startup/ consumer tech/ other B2C businesses. **Nature and scope of responsibilities the candidate should have handled**  

 0 to 3 years of prior experience of working as an assistant manager or senior brand executive in core brand management profile, preferably in start-ups /FMCG/ Consumer Tech and other B2C businesses* End to end campaign management – concept, budgeting execution, tracking and reporting
* Strong Communication Skills

* Proficient in Excel / Google Spreadsheets and PowerPoint

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Seeking Marketing Manager to drive strategic initiatives, manage campaigns, and enhance brand visibility. Responsibilities include developing marketing plans, overseeing advertising efforts, and analyzing market trends. The ideal candidate possesses strong leadership skills, creative thinking, and proficiency in digital marketing tools. With a proven track record in marketing strategy execution, they will propel our brand to new heights.


###### **Responsibilities:**


* Work collaboratively to strategically plan, develop and execute marketing campaigns to market diverse products and services while reinforcing our brand attributes and differentiators.


* Research, develop, execute, manage, and measure the effectiveness of integrated marketing campaigns and communications to support business strategies for both internal and external audiences (including customers, industry partners, vendors, community stakeholders, industry associations, etc.).


* Responsible for overall development and maintenance of website including page updates, new page development, blogs, case studies and other resources.


* Work closely with SEO partners to ensure success of website and online advertising opportunities.


* Proficient in social media engagement via Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter.


* Create compelling, informative and audience-centric marketing and communications materials including: briefs, corporate profiles, key messages, executive speaking notes, customer presentations, brochures, videos, photo library, advertising copy, and digital and print content.


* Oversee hiring and managing of contractors (designers, writers, editors and other creative staff) to assist in the creation of internal and external communications tools.


* Identify and coordinate participation in industry trade shows and events.


* Monitor market trends and research consumer markets and competitors' activities to aid in the development of marketing campaigns and inspire the development of high-quality creative assets.


* Ensure all products, services and communication materials conform to brand identity.


* Oversee the application process of vendor joint marketing programs.


* Manage internal communication programming and messaging.


* Analyze marketing performance, optimize ROI for all advertising channels and events.

  


###### **Basic Qualifications:**


* Bachelors Degree/ Master ‘ degree in marketing
* 3-5 years of progressive, related experience in marketing and communications strategy and execution, ideally in a corporate setting.
* Exceptional project management skills, collaborative team player able to support multiple business priorities and tight deadlines.
* Experience in working on programs driven by large technology partners like Microsoft, SAP, HP, HCL or other technology companies.
* Strong customer-centric focus, with a proven ability to build and maintain effective relationships at all levels of an organization.
* Experience with social media and metrics data analysis for optimization.
* Grasp of brand development and ability to develop, write and implement strategic, integrated communications and marketing plans to promote brand.
* Strong overall business acumen and strategic mindset including understanding of budgeting, planning, advertising and promotions
* Exceptional writing and storytelling skills (written and verbal).
* Strong attention to detail.
* Team handling capacity
* Ability to drive the campaigns and projects.
