title: Social Media Manager
description:
Womennovator intends to engage Content writer cum Social Media Manager on the following terms and conditions:  

  

**Job responsibilities:** We need a content writer cum social media manager who will help in content creation, managing content on the website, and maintaining different social media platforms. The manager will develop and implement a Womennovator social media strategy, develop brand awareness, generate inbound traffic to social media platforms, and websites.
  

* Content Creation (Large and Technical) for the Womennovator’s website and social media platforms.
* Proofreading and editing.
* Content creation for Media (Print, Broadcast, and Digital)
* Managing social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Blogs, YouTube, LinkedIn), overseeing design (Facebook timeline cover pic, display ads, thumbnails, ads, profile pic, YouTube branding, Twitter profile, Instagram stories, and feed, and other theme-based events branding), overseeing day to day social media activity (addressing queries, concerns, flagging inappropriate comments and posts, writing and
scheduling daily posts, etc.).
* Help in the promotion (campaign planning and execution), create a unique voice for the brand on social media and Womennovator website and generate relevant content (on all social and online forums) to reach the audience most likely to engage with Womennovator.
* Develop a strategy to promote externally funded projects, executive education, in-house activities (seminars and workshops), and outbound events.
* Implement Search Engine Optimization (SEOs) for the website and Social Media.
* Using analytics (Google, Facebook, and other social media management tool) for effective social media presence and positive brand image of Womennovator.
* Maintain database for Womennovator & create and control the content calendar for several accounts across platforms, as well as the key influencer and stakeholders that touch them, both internally and externally.
* Liaise with internal teams such as clubs, committees, cells, programs, externally funded projects, theme-based events, etc., for content creation and management. Liaise with in-house designers and photographers, to produce creative assets and to share on different media channels.

  

**Womennovator Required qualifications:**  

* An M.A. degree in Mass Communication and Journalism or English or Media Studies or New Media Communication or Creative Writing or MBA in Marketing or Media Management.
* 3+ years of Social Media Marketing experience in corporate marketing, education the sector, social sector, or agency marketing role. Knowledge of Internet Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Web Development are desirable.
* Verifiable examples of social media marketing successes on different platforms - Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+, YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram.
* Expert level skills in using and navigating social media networks, native web apps, 3rd party social media tools.
* Candidate must possess good writing skills and the ability to visualize and convey a message with interesting and relevant content.

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Role: Marketing Manager  

Experience: 10–15 years in Marketing Domain.  

Education: Graduate - Marketing or MBA - Marketing Specialisation.  

Location: Pune.

**JOB SUMMARY:**  

  

SPAR Solutions seeks a dynamic, collaborative Marketing Manager to own, drive, and execute a comprehensive and integrated digital marketing and GTM strategy, product marketing, and campaigns in support of the business goals. He/She should be comfortable with day-to-day marketing activities, as well as long-term strategy, thriving with tight deadlines and changing needs. If you are a people person who loves the rewarding challenge of building a brand, we want to hear from you.

**POSITION REQUIREMENTS (Qualifications and Experience)**  

  

* Extensive demand generation experience in B2B tech, with expertise in leveraging digital channels to drive lead generation and brand amplification.
* Strong analytical skills, and demonstrable experience synthesizing data and making strategic decisions using Salesforce, Account Engagement (Pardot), etc.
* Empathy – for our team, our partners, our clients, and their customers.
* Team player with exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to operate and excel at strategic as well as tactical levels. Willingness to roll up sleeves to get the job done.
* Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, both at the executive level and with peers and cross-functional teams. Can clearly articulate ideas, frame problems and offer solutions.
* Ability to develop and optimize marketing strategies across key channels: SEO/SEM, paid social, email, owned web media properties, and third-party.
* Strong copywriting skills.
* Natural curiosity to discern product and solution messaging and position opportunities in the market to drive adoption and revenue targets.
* Oversee design and creatives.
* Strong and effective Storyteller.
* Knowledge of Pragmatic Product Marketing Framework.
* Thrive in complexity and ambiguity.
* Must be technically proficient and have a strong understanding of marketing processes.
* Ability to translate business needs into technical requirements.
* Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools.
* Analytical thinker, naturally curious, and thrives in working in cross-functional teams.
* Must be passionate about digital and interactive marketing strategies and integrated marketing.
* Must be motivated, a self-starter, a change agent and a perpetual learner.
**KEY DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:**

* **Demand Generation:** Plan, implement, and measure multi-channel demand generation programs to drive brand awareness, inbound pipeline generation, and accelerated inbound revenue.
* **Leadership, Strategy, and Project Management:** Work directly with internal stakeholders, leadership and creative teams, leading the execution of our programs.
* **Data Analysis and Reporting:** Analyze performance data, report on the results, including campaign results, and data stories, and send recommendations. Rapidly iterate on a strategy based on findings.
* **Revenue Accountability:** Be accountable to revenue results, not leads.
* Bring products and solutions to the market through a pragmatic approach.
* Manage and oversee the marketing team, interns, and agencies.
* Have a strong design, writing, video creation and storytelling background.
* Coordinate and oversee all marketing projects and be very comfortable working in an agile environment that is fast-moving and technical.
* Help manage the current partnerships and enhance our web, social, and traditional marketing initiatives.
* Develop digital marketing strategies including the management and optimization of SEM, SEO, Social Marketing, LinkedIn, Content Creation (Video, Design, Podcast, etc.) and Email Marketing Automation using industry best practices.
* Collaborate with key stakeholders to develop, monitor, and optimize programs throughout the customer journey and sales funnel.
* Identify opportunities to develop new channels and/or expand existing channels for customer acquisition.
* Paid Media Campaign Management: Plan, test, implement, and measure multi-channel media campaigns to drive inbound demand.
* Perform audience research to develop new campaign ideas for paid search and paid social.
* Manage day-to-day performance across several media channels including LinkedIn.
* Rapidly iterate on a strategy based on findings.

**Note:**  

Should be open to adjusting to the US timings since collaboration with the US team is essential for this role.

**Physical Requirements:**

* **Should be willing to work from office.**
* **Should be able to join immediately.**
* Must be able to perform the essential functions of the position with or without reasonable accommodation.

**COMPANY PROFILE**:  

SPAR Solutions (based out of Atlanta, USA and Pune, India) is an employee-friendly place full of confident, result-oriented people with high energy levels and uncompromising work ethics. Compensation (matches or exceeds industry benchmarks) is driven by merit and performance; there is no limit to professional growth.


If you believe that values like a consultative, detail-oriented, quick learner, team player, high performance, creativity and fun are your calling, you would be a great fit on our team.  

  

**Contact Details:**  

Talent Acquisition Team  

HRM | HR Department/ SPAR Solutions  

Address: SPAR Solutions India Pvt. Ltd. Pune IT Park,  

B - 503, Bhau Patil Marg, 34 Aundh Road, Bopodi, Pune.  

Maharashtra, India. Pin Code: 411020.  

Website: sparsolutions.com  

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/spar-solutions-llc  

Twitter: https://twitter.com/sparsolutions  

FB: https://www.facebook.com/SPARsolutions

title: Digital Marketer
description:
We are looking for a creative and analytical digital marketing manager to join our team. You will be in charge of developing and implementing our digital marketing strategy, as well as managing and overseeing our digital marketing campaigns across all platforms. You will work closely with the marketing team, the sales team, and external partners to achieve our marketing goals and grow our online presence.

* Strategic thinking
* Data analysis
* Social media marketing
* Content marketing
* SEO
* SEM
* Email marketing
* Creative and communication skills


#### **Job Duties:**


* Plan and execute all digital marketing activities, including SEO, SEM, email, social media, and display advertising

title: Fundraising Manager
description:
**Designation** - Digital Fundraising Manager  

  

**Reports to** – Director  

  

**Experience required** – 4-6 Years  

  

**Job Summary** - The Digital Fundraising Manager manages and oversees growth of online fundraising and engagement programs by executing effective strategies and techniques via email, website promotions, and other digital channels. The Manager will provide coordinated leadership of digital fundraising and engagement activities, developing and implementing marketing strategies to support fundraising across the organization.  

  

**Responsibilities include but not limited to** -  

* Leading and executing Womennovator’s digital programme to enhance our campaigning and fundraising:
* Develop our digital strategy and targets with oversight from the leadership team, to ensure we deliver on our campaigns and fundraising goals.
* Oversee digital fundraising and engagement initiatives to acquire, renew and retain members.
* Develop and manage emails, landing pages, tools and graphics for online fundraising activities,
* Implement Peer-to-Peer fundraising initiatives
* Pro-actively manage budgets, monitor and report on digital fundraising campaigns to ensure digital fundraising delivers on target.
* Grow Womennovator’s list and manage the email programme to ensure supporter-focused communications that drives action and maximises retention.
* Manage social media channels to ensure timely, platform-tailored content that encourages engagement.
* Update, develop and optimise Womennovator’s website
* Create engaging, optimised digital content across social media, email and webpages from inception to execution.
* Oversee budgets for specific projects as delegated
* Proactively stay updated with best-practice and industry

 developments, being the organisation’s resident digital expert, and advising other team members.  

  

**Knowledge and Skills Required** -  

* Master’s degree preferred, plus 4-5 years of Significant experience and recognised expert in all aspects of digital, with a strong understanding of fundraising
* Knowledge of and proven ability to develop and implement digital fundraising strategies.
* Display creativity and initiative; respond quickly to last-minute needs and changing priorities.
* A team player that is detail-oriented, organized, motivated and creative.
* Must have good judgment and the ability to handle confidential matters.
* Enthusiasm for public media with a desire to create and share a solid case for support with staff, donors, viewers.

title: Senior Content Manager
description:
We are a dynamic and innovative company dedicated to creating engaging content across various domains including tech, automobiles, health, and finance. We are seeking a talented Senior Content Manager to oversee the management and growth of our multiple YouTube channels. This role is crucial in driving audience engagement, community building, and content strategy execution.

Individuals with content writing, presenting and editing experiences would find this to be a full-filling role.

**Role Overview:**  
The Senior Content Manager will be responsible for managing the production flow, uploading content, writing engaging copy, and building communities around our YouTube channels. The role requires strong communication skills in English and Hindi, as well as the ability to collaborate effectively with founders, content creators, video editors, and external stakeholders.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Manage the production flow of content for multiple YouTube channels.
* Manage schedule & Upload content and ensure it aligns with the channel's brand and objectives.
* Write compelling copy and create engaging text and graphic content across various domains.
* Develop and execute strategies to engage the audience and build communities around the channels.
* Collaborate with founders, content creators, and video editors to ensure content quality and consistency.
* Monitor channel performance and analyze audience engagement metrics to optimize content strategy.
* Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in content creation and YouTube channel management.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Communications, Marketing, Journalism, or related field. But so far as you can do the task, we do not care what you studied.
* Excellent communication skills in English and Hindi, both written and verbal.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Creative thinker with a passion for content creation and community building.
* Good to have: understanding of YouTube analytics and audience engagement metrics
* Proficiency in graphic design tools and basic video editing skills are a plus.
* Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and external stakeholders.

**Location:**  
This is a full-time position based in our office in Aundh, Pune. Candidates must be willing to work from the office on a regular basis.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
* Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
* Dynamic and collaborative work environment.

If you believe you have the skills and experience to excel in this role, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining why you are a good fit for this position. We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

**Application Instructions:**

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity in the workplace. We encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply. We prefer that you apply online on the portal instead of calling us. Interview process would involve a written test and some other assignments.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**About the Company:**

Hectar is a fast-growing Agri Tech startup that is transforming the way Agri commodities are supplied across borders. We are digitizing cross-border supply chains, making them more efficient, transparent, and sustainable. Our mission is to empower farmers and buyers by providing them with cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights that help them make better decisions and achieve better outcomes. We are passionate about using technology to make the Agri supply chain more resilient, secure, and profitable for all stakeholders.

**Job Description:**

We're looking for a highly creative and talented individual to join our team as a Creative Content Writer and Social Media Manager. In this role, you will be responsible for creating compelling visual and written content that showcases Hectar Global's mission to digitize cross-border supply chains of Agri commodities. You will work closely with the marketing and sales teams to develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns across digital and social media platforms.

Your main goal will be to bring the Hectar Global brand to life and make it exciting, inspiring, and aspirational for our target audience. You'll also be responsible for creating high-quality, engaging content that resonates with our customers and drives brand awareness and loyalty.

**Responsibilities:**

1. Develop and execute Hectar Global's brand strategy across multiple channels

2. Create and implement social media campaigns that engage and inspire our target audience

3. Develop and produce high-quality, engaging content for social media, website, email, and other channels

4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, sales, and marketing, to ensure brand consistency across all touchpoints

5. Monitor and analyze social media and website metrics to track performance and identify areas for improvement

6. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices, and apply them to our brand strategy and content creation

**Requirements:**

§ Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field

§ 1+ years of experience in brand strategy, content creation, and social media marketing

§ Strong creative vision and ability to bring ideas to life

§ Excellent written and verbal communication skills

§ Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, social media platforms, and content management systems

§ Passion for agriculture industry and making a positive impact on farmers' livelihoods

§ Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Join our team and help us bring the Hectar Global brand to life in a way that inspires positive change in the agriculture industry.

description:
**Title: Performance Marketing Specialist (PPC)**

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and execute impactful marketing strategies across various platforms, including Google Ads, Bing, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube.
* Enhance campaign effectiveness by utilizing native marketing tools like Taboola and Quora.
* Oversee large-scale, performance-driven PPC campaigns on enterprise-level platforms.
* Craft engaging ad copy, conduct thorough A/B testing, and optimize campaign performance, focusing on Dynamic Search Ads, Remarketing, and dynamic remarketing.
* Conduct comprehensive data analysis to uncover insights, facilitate informed decision-making, and improve campaign outcomes.
* Supervise audience targeting and keyword selection processes, implementing robust strategies to prevent click fraud.
* Stay updated on SEM and PPC trends, integrating innovative strategies into campaigns.

* Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint.
* Exceptional writing skills and content creation abilities.

* Minimum bachelor's degree in any field.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
As a Digital Marketing Associate at Matsio, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing effective digital marketing strategies to enhance our online presence and drive business growth. You will work closely with the marketing team to execute campaigns across various digital channels, analyze performance metrics, and contribute to the overall success of Matsio's marketing initiatives.

* **Digital Campaign Management**

Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across channels such as social media, email, and display advertising.

Collaborate with the marketing team to create engaging and compelling content that aligns with Matsio's brand.

* **Social Media Management**

Manage and grow Matsio's presence on social media platforms, including but not limited to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Monitor social media trends, engage with the audience, and analyze performance metrics to drive improvements.

* **SEO and SEM**

Implement SEO strategies to improve Matsio's search engine rankings and visibility.

Assist in managing paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, etc.) to maximize ROI and drive targeted traffic.

* **Content Marketing**

Contribute to content creation for various digital channels, ensuring alignment with Matsio's brand voice and messaging.

Collaborate with the content team to develop blog posts, articles, and other relevant content.

* **Analytics and Reporting**

Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of digital marketing efforts.

Prepare regular reports, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.

* **Collaboration and Communication**

Work closely with cross-functional teams, including design, content, and sales, to ensure cohesive and integrated marketing campaigns.

Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders and external partners.

**Qualifications**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
* Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on ***social media, SEO, and SEM.***
* Familiarity with marketing analytics tools and platforms.
* ***Strong written and verbal communication skills.***
* Creative mindset with the ability to think strategically.

description:
**DIGITAL MARKETING EXECUTIVE JD**

**Lead Generation Specialist (Digital marketing)**

Min experience – 2 years

Job location – work from office

Duration – 6 days in week

Profile – Full time

Salary – Between 20,000 – 25,000 per month

Incentive – As per policy

**Job details:**

A Digital Marketing Executive plays a crucial role in planning, executing, and managing online marketing campaigns for a company or client. The specific job details may vary depending on the organization, industry, and the scale of their digital marketing efforts. Here is a general overview of the typical responsibilities and qualifications for a Digital Marketing Executive:

**Job Responsibilities:**

1. **Campaign Planning and Execution:**

· Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to achieve business goals.

· Plan and execute online marketing campaigns across various channels such as social media, email, search engine optimization (SEO), and pay-per-click (PPC) advertising.

2. **Content Marketing:**

· Create and optimize content for digital platforms, including websites, blogs, and social media.

· Develop and manage content calendars to ensure a consistent flow of content.

3. **Social Media Management:**

· Manage and grow the company's presence on social media platforms.

· Create and curate engaging content, and interact with the audience to build brand awareness.

· Tele-calling for lead generation

· Converting into f2f meeting

· Handle all social;

4. **SEO and SEM:**

· Optimize website content for search engines to improve organic visibility (SEO).

· Implement and manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms like Google Ads (SEM).

5. **Email Marketing:**

· Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers.

· Monitor and analyze email campaign performance and make data-driven improvements.

6. **Analytics and Reporting:**

· Use analytics tools to track and measure the performance of digital marketing campaigns.

· Prepare regular reports, analyze data, and provide insights to improve campaign effectiveness.

7. **Budget Management:**

· Manage budgets for various digital marketing channels and campaigns.

· Optimize spending to maximize ROI and achieve marketing objectives.

8. **Market Research:**

· Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies.

· Conduct market research to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.

**Qualifications and Skills:**

1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

2. Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on campaign management.

3. Familiarity with various digital marketing channels and tools.

4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

6. Creativity and the ability to think strategically.

7. Proficiency in using digital marketing tools such as Google Analytics, SEO tools, and social media management platforms.

8. Up-to-date knowledge of the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.

Digital Marketing Executives often work closely with other departments, such as sales, design, and IT, to ensure a cohesive and effective digital marketing strategy. The role is dynamic and requires adaptability to the rapidly changing landscape of digital marketing

title: Performance Manager
description:
**Performance Marketing Manager**

**About the Company:**

Alviras Solutions is a dynamic digital marketing agency that thrives on creating compelling and result-driven strategies for businesses of all sizes.

We don't just navigate the digital landscape; we sculpt it, color it, and make it resonate with the heartbeat of global brands. We're not just marketers; we're digital artisans crafting experiences that leave a lasting impression.

Our core team is loaded with experienced digital marketing professionals, PPC, SEO experts, social media experts, content writers, website designers, graphic designers and web developers.

Alviras Solutions leverages online marketing to help top brands in USA, Europe & UK to grow exponentially. We have established a global footprint and serve clients from diverse industry verticals.

**Roles & Responsibilities**

● Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to achieve company objectives, including sales and brand awareness.

● Plan, create, and manage digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels, such as social media, email, search engine marketing (SEM), display advertising, and content marketing.

● Plan, launch, and manage digital advertising campaigns across various channels, including but not limited to paid search (PPC), paid social (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.), display advertising, and retargeting.

● Manage and optimize website content and user experience to enhance online visibility, engagement, and conversion rates.

● Monitor and analyze key performance metrics to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing initiatives and optimize campaigns for maximum ROI.

● Stay updated on the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in digital marketing, and recommend innovative strategies to drive continuous improvement.

● Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and design, to align digital marketing efforts with overall business objectives.

● Manage relationships with external vendors, agencies, and partners to support digital marketing initiatives as needed.

● Stay abreast of industry regulations and compliance standards related to digital marketing activities.

**Qualifications:**

● Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business Administration, or related field. Master's degree preferred.

● Proven experience in digital marketing, with a minimum of [X] years in a managerial or leadership role.

● Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, strategies, and best practices.

● Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, such as Google Analytics, AdWords, Facebook Ads Manager, email marketing software, and content management systems (CMS).

● Excellent analytical skills and ability to interpret data to drive informed decision-making.

● Creative thinker with a passion for innovation and problem-solving.

● Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.

● Results-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving measurable outcomes and KPIs.

● Ability to multitask, prioritize projects, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

title: Marketing Program Manager
description:
We’re a diverse group of committed individuals empowered to thrive on challenge, share ideas, and pursue our ambition to transform the way commerce works.
  
  

So what about you? Do you want to help shape the future? Join us and you’ll open the gateway to a world of endless possibilities.
  
  

At Productsup you’ll be an intrinsic player in a vibrant culture that brings together people with opportunities, ideas with implementation, and ambition with achievement.
  
  

You can make great things happen in your career by making great things happen in commerce.
  
  

Productsup - the place where people are empowered to shape the future of commerce.
  
  

Your role and goals
  
  

We're looking for a Marketing Programs manager (m/f/d) to organize and oversee marketing programs and initiatives.
  
  

You will have a direct impact on our events and webinars, thus contributing to our MQL’s and growth goals. You will also collaborate with many stakeholders, so communication skills and willingness to collaborate are the key to success in this role!
  
  

**In your first 3 months you will:**  

* Get to know the organisation, team and your main stakeholders
* Understand the Productsup platform, our use cases, personas and competitor landscape as well as the structure and workflows of the Marketing organisation
* Start planning your first own program: develop campaign ideas, messaging and themes for specific target audience segments based on your knowledge of the market, our use cases, personas and their challenges


**In your first 6 months and beyond you will:**  

* Take full ownership of your programs from strategy to execution
* Leverage and contribute to our SAL and marketing pipeline goals
* Work together with our Content and Performance teams to get their support to deliver excellent programs
* Liaise with our Operations team as well as Pre-Sales and Sales to ensure a proper lead flow, a timely and individualized follow-up and also reporting for your marketing campaigns
* Leverage other channels like events and webinars owned by your colleagues in the Programs team


What you bring to the team
  
  

* Extensive experience in planning and executing marketing campaigns
* 5+ years’ experience in marketing for a B2B tech company (preferably SaaS)
* Strong project management skills
* Degree in marketing, corporate communications, or equivalent work experience
* Fluency in English (and German as a big plus) with excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Experience with marketing automation and CRM Systems (familiarity with Hubspot and Salesforce is a plus)
* Tech-savvy with a solid understanding of the online marketing and/or e-commerce industries
* Email-marketing (and nurturing) experience
* Ability to turn complex ideas into clear creative messages
* You are creative, love to take initiative, and cooperate with others


What we offer you
  
  

* A permanent position with an attractive salary at our growing company
* The option to work remotely and flexibly, because we know outstanding talent knows best how and where to work
* A unique and thorough onboarding program where you’ll learn the ins and outs of our company and product
* Ongoing internal and external training, plus a yearly learning budget to help you continuously grow professionally and further your career with Productsup
* Opportunities for engaging in our Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives, plus one paid Impact Day per year dedicated to voluntary work
* Employee referral bonuses: we know that talent attracts talent, and we encourage you to refer people you know to join our team
* The opportunity to take ownership and responsibility, impacting the company’s growth in an international environment with 40+ nationalities

title: Sales and Marketing Manager
description:
Sales and Marketing Associate at Zorrro  
Location : Kolkata  
About Zorrro :  
Zorrro is a leading hyperlocal delivery service based in Kolkata, dedicated to providing prompt and efficient delivery solutions to businesses and consumers alike. Our mission is to streamline the local logistics landscape through innovative solutions, exceptional service, and community-focused initiatives.  
Position: Sales and Marketing Manager  
Role Overview:  
We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales and Marketing Associate to lead our B2B sales efforts and marketing strategies. This role involves a hands-on approach to identifying and engaging with potential business clients, devising effective marketing plans, and working closely with the design team to create compelling social media campaigns. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker with a proven track record in sales and marketing, possessing the ability to drive growth and increase market share in the competitive hyperlocal delivery sector.  
Key Responsibilities:  
- Develop and execute strategic B2B sales plans to identify, engage, and secure new business opportunities within the Kolkata area.  
- Lead and coordinate marketing efforts, including market research, brand strategy, and the execution of marketing campaigns to increase brand visibility and market penetration.  
- Collaborate with the design team to create engaging and effective marketing materials and social media content, ensuring consistency in brand messaging across all platforms.  
- Plan and manage social media strategy, including content creation, scheduling, analysis, and engagement to enhance online presence and community engagement.  
- Analyze market trends and competitor activity to inform strategic decisions and identify opportunities for growth.  
- Establish and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and team members, to foster collaboration and drive business results.  
- Monitor and report on the effectiveness of sales and marketing initiatives, using data to refine and adjust strategies as needed.  
- Lead, motivate, and develop the sales and marketing team to achieve set goals and objectives.  
Qualifications:  
- Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.  
- Minimum of 1-3 years of experience in sales and marketing, with a focus on B2B sales and digital marketing strategies.  
- Proven track record of developing and executing successful sales and marketing plans.  
- Strong understanding of the Kolkata market and the hyperlocal delivery industry.  
- Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.  
- Proficient in using social media platforms and marketing tools to drive business objectives.  
- Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.  
- Strong analytical skills with a data-driven approach to decision-making.  
What We Offer:  
- A dynamic and challenging work environment with the opportunity to contribute to the growth of an innovative local business.  
- Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.  
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.  
- A collaborative team culture that values creativity, innovation, and diversity.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
**Job Description –** 

As a Digital Marketing Executive, you will be responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing digital marketing campaigns across various platforms. You will monitor campaign performance, analyze key metrics, and make data-driven decisions to improve ROI. Additionally, you will coordinate with cross-functional teams, stay updated on industry trends, and contribute to the overall growth of our digital marketing efforts.

**KRA**

1. Planning Campaigns and Budget Allocation:

Allocate budgets to different platforms and categories.

Define campaign objectives and target audiences.

Plan advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads, Meta Ads, YouTube, etc.

Monitoring and Analyzing Campaign Performance:

2. Regularly monitor the performance of ongoing campaigns.

Analyze key metrics on platforms like Meta and Google Ads.

Identify areas for improvement and optimization.

Optimization and ROAS:

3. Optimize campaigns based on observed key metrics.

Focus on maintaining a positive Return on Advertising Spend (ROAS).

New Audience Exploration and Placement Analysis:

4. Explore new target audiences for campaigns.

Analyze ad placement options for optimal reach and engagement.

SEO Growth Tracking and Coordination:

5. Coordinate with an agency or team to track SEO growth.

Ensure alignment between paid advertising and organic search strategies.

Define positioning for new product launches and share with organic searches.

Execution of Various Advertising Campaigns:

6. Execute campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads, Meta Ads, YouTube, etc.

Coordinate with affiliates for promotional activities.

Manage payment gateways for seamless transactions.

Performance Review and Reporting:

7. Review campaign performance in terms of sales and spends.

Prepare reports to monitor performance at the category and brand levels.

Track website metrics on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis.

Coordination with Category Team:

8. Collaborate with the category team to align communication and target audiences for ads.

Provide content and creative requirements for all categories and platforms.

Brand Awareness Campaigns:

9. Plan and execute campaigns focused on brand awareness.

10. Training and Knowledge Sharing:

Provide training to category managers and marketing teams.

Help build understanding of ad dashboards and channel functioning.

Guide team members on effective optimization strategies.

11. Staying Updated on Ad Platforms and Analytics:

Keep up with new updates on advertising platforms.

Stay informed about analytics platforms like GA4, Google Analytics, and Shopify.

Utilize accurate data to plan and optimize campaigns effectively.

Remember to adapt these tasks based on your specific industry, company, and campaign objectives

title: SEO Specialist
description:
**SEO Specialist**

**Experience:** 3+ years

**Salary:** AUD 1,300 / month

**Expected Notice Period**: 2 to 4 Weeks

**Shift**: 7:30AM to 4:30PM IST

**Opportunity Type:** Remote

**Placement Type:** Contractual

**Contract Duration:** Full-Time, Indefinite Period

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients)**

**What do you need for this opportunity?**

**Primary Skills**:

Wordpress CMS, Backlink, Google Search Console, Keyword Research, Off-page SEO, SEO Audit, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, On-page SEO, SEO, Strong Attention To Detail, Technical SEO

**Assessment:** 

Role based AI Screening covering Communication and Technical Skills

**Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:**

SEO Specialist who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

**Roles & Responsibilities**

As an SEO Specialist, you will play a crucial role in enhancing the online presence of our clients by implementing effective search engine optimization strategies. You will be responsible for conducting comprehensive keyword research, devising SEO strategies tailored to client needs, and executing various on-page and off-page optimization techniques. This role requires a keen understanding of SEO principles, excellent communication skills, and a proactive approach to driving organic traffic and improving search engine rankings.

**Responsibilities:**

**Keyword Research & Mapping:**

* Conduct in-depth keyword research to identify relevant and high-volume search terms.
* Develop keyword mapping strategies to align with client objectives and target audience.

**SEO Strategy Development:**

* Formulate and implement SEO strategies that align with client goals and industry best practices.
* Stay updated with the latest SEO trends and algorithm changes to adapt strategies accordingly.

**On-page SEO:**

* Optimize website content, meta tags, headings, and other on-page elements for improved search visibility.
* Implement technical SEO optimizations to enhance website performance and crawlability.

**Technical SEO:**

* Audit websites for technical SEO issues and implement necessary fixes.
* Ensure websites comply with search engine guidelines and best practices.

**Off-page SEO (Outreach/Backlink Acquisition):**

* Execute outreach campaigns to acquire high-quality backlinks from authoritative websites.
* Build and maintain relationships with relevant influencers and webmasters.

**Google Business Profile Optimizations:**

* Optimize Google My Business profiles to improve local search visibility and enhance online reputation.
* Manage and respond to customer reviews and inquiries on Google Business profiles.

**Report Writing:**

* Prepare comprehensive SEO performance reports, analyzing key metrics and providing actionable insights.
* Communicate findings and recommendations to clients in a clear and concise manner

**Shift Time:**

* 7:30 AM to 4:30 PM IST

**Project Requirements:**

* Fluent English and excellent writing skills to communicate effectively with clients and create compelling content.
* Strong understanding of SEO principles with a proven track record of improving search rankings and organic traffic.
* Proficiency in conversion tracking and Google Tag Manager (GTM) to measure and analyze website conversions.
* Attention to detail and ability to follow instructions meticulously to ensure the accuracy and effectiveness of SEO campaigns.
* Strong time management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet strict deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

**Interview Rounds:**

* R1 - Assessment of skill (project they will need to complete)
* R2 - Video interview with questions (both technical and soft skills

**How to apply for this opportunity?**

* Register or login on our portal & fill out the application
* Clear the given AI Screening (30 min) and Click on ‘Apply’ to get shortlisted
* Our team of talent matchmakers will matchmake you with the client
* Crack a quick interview with our client
* Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!

**About our Hiring Partner:**

We are a leading Australian SEO agency looking for a talented SEO Specialist to join our team on a full-time basis. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing clients' websites, and improving organic rankings through SEO. The emphasis of this role is knowing WHAT to do, not just HOW to do it. Which means you will need to have an understanding of what outcomes will achieve maximum ROI for clients. You will not have many clients, but the expectation is that work is done exceptionally well as there will be ample time to make SEO decisions. You will start with about 5 clients, but will never have more than 10. This is not a client facing role, which means that you will never directly communicate with clients. However, this means that you must be on top of the campaigns at all times and proactively make SEO magic happen. Reporting will be done to the director once per week, and a log should be maintained for all SEO actions (so you must be organised). You MUST have at least 2 years of experience in a similar role.

**About Uplers:**

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(**Note:** There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

title: Marketing Manager
description:
### **Overview:**


We are seeking a talented and strategic ABM Manager/Expert to lead our Account-Based Marketing initiatives. The ideal candidate will possess in-depth knowledge of ABM strategies and tools such as Demandbase, 6sense, HubSpot, and Sales Intelligence platforms, and a proven track record of successful ABM campaigns. This role requires a strategic mindset, strong analytical skills, and the ability to collaborate across departments to drive targeted engagement and revenue growth.

### **Key Responsibilities:**

* **ABM Strategy Development:** Design, develop, and execute comprehensive ABM strategies aligned with company goals and target accounts.
* **Technology Proficiency:** Utilize and optimize tools such as Demandbase, 6sense, HubSpot, and Sales Intelligence platforms to identify, target, and engage key accounts effectively.
* **Campaign Management:** Lead end-to-end ABM campaigns, from planning and execution to analysis and optimization, ensuring alignment with sales objectives and maximizing ROI.
* **Sales Alignment:** Collaborate closely with the sales team to align ABM efforts with their strategies, ensuring seamless coordination and mutual support in account targeting and engagement.
* **Data-Driven Insights:** Leverage data and analytics to drive decision-making, measure campaign performance, and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement.
* **Content and Messaging:** Work with the marketing team to develop personalized, high-impact content and messaging tailored to targeted accounts.
* **Cross-Functional Collaboration:** Engage with various teams including marketing, sales, product, and customer success to ensure a cohesive ABM approach across the organization.


‍

### **Qualifications and Skills:**

* Proven experience (3+ years) in Account-Based Marketing, preferably in a B2B technology or SaaS environment.
* Proficiency in Demandbase, 6sense, HubSpot, and other relevant ABM and marketing automation tools.
* Strong understanding of sales funnels, lead nurturing, and customer journey mapping.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to derive insights from data to drive marketing decisions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for effective collaboration across teams.
* Strategic thinking with the ability to translate goals into actionable plans.
* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field (preferred).


‍

### **What can you look for?**


A wholesome opportunity in a fast-paced environment that will enable you to juggle between concepts, yet maintain the quality of content, interact, and share your ideas and have loads of learning while at work. Work with a team of highly talented young professionals and enjoy the benefits of being at Xoxoday.


‍

### **We are**


Xoxoday is a rapidly growing fintech SaaS firm that propels business growth while focusing on human motivation. Backed by Giift and Apis Partners Growth Fund II, Xoxoday offers a suite of three products - Plum, Empuls, and Compass. Xoxoday works with more than 2000 clients across 10+ countries and over 2.5 million users. Headquartered in Bengaluru, Xoxoday is a 300+ strong team with four global offices in San Francisco, Dublin, Singapore, New Delhi.


‍

### **Way forward**


We look forward to connecting with you. As you may take time to review this opportunity, we will wait for a reasonable time of around 3-5 days before we screen the collected applications and start lining up job discussions with the hiring manager. We however assure you that we will attempt to maintain a reasonable time window for successfully closing this requirement. The candidates will be kept informed and updated on the feedback and application status.

title: Marketing Program Manager
description:
We're a diverse group of committed individuals empowered to thrive on challenge, share ideas, and pursue our ambition to transform the way commerce works.



So what about you? Do you want to help shape the future? Join us and you'll open the gateway to a world of endless possibilities.



At Productsup you'll be an intrinsic player in a vibrant culture that brings together people with opportunities, ideas with implementation, and ambition with achievement.



You can make great things happen in your career by making great things happen in commerce.


**Productsup - the place where people are empowered to shape the future of commerce.**

### **Your role and goals**



We're looking for a Marketing Programs manager (m/f/d) to organize and oversee marketing programs and initiatives.



You will have a direct impact on our events and webinars, thus contributing to our MQL's and growth goals. You will also collaborate with many stakeholders, so communication skills and willingness to collaborate are the key to success in this role!

  

**In your first 3 months you will:**


* Get to know the organisation, team and your main stakeholders
* Understand the Productsup platform, our use cases, personas and competitor landscape as well as the structure and workflows of the Marketing organisation
* Start planning your first own program: develop campaign ideas, messaging and themes for specific target audience segments based on your knowledge of the market, our use cases, personas and their challenges


**In your first 6 months and beyond you will:**


* Take full ownership of your programs from strategy to execution
* Leverage and contribute to our SAL and marketing pipeline goals
* Work together with our Content and Performance teams to get their support to deliver excellent programs
* Liaise with our Operations team as well as Pre-Sales and Sales to ensure a proper lead flow, a timely and individualized follow-up and also reporting for your marketing campaigns
* Leverage other channels like events and webinars owned by your colleagues in the Programs team

### **What you bring to the team**


* Extensive experience in planning and executing marketing campaigns
* 5+ years' experience in marketing for a B2B tech company (preferably SaaS)
* Strong project management skills
* Degree in marketing, corporate communications, or equivalent work experience
* Fluency in English (and German as a big plus) with excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Experience with marketing automation and CRM Systems (familiarity with Hubspot and Salesforce is a plus)
* Tech-savvy with a solid understanding of the online marketing and/or e-commerce industries
* Email-marketing (and nurturing) experience
* Ability to turn complex ideas into clear creative messages
* You are creative, love to take initiative, and cooperate with others

### **What we offer you**


* A permanent position with an attractive salary at our growing company
* The option to work remotely and flexibly, because we know outstanding talent knows best how and where to work
* A unique and thorough onboarding program where you'll learn the ins and outs of our company and product
* Ongoing internal and external training, plus a yearly learning budget to help you continuously grow professionally and further your career with Productsup
* Opportunities for engaging in our Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives, plus one paid Impact Day per year dedicated to voluntary work
* Employee referral bonuses: we know that talent attracts talent, and we encourage you to refer people you know to join our team
* The opportunity to take ownership and responsibility, impacting the company's growth in an international environment with 40+ nationalities

 *Productsup values diversity. We celebrate our differences and strive to learn from each other with the firm conviction that diversity drives innovation. Our commitment to equal opportunities begins at the hiring process and extends to our whole working culture. We pledge to social and environmental initiatives that support a sustainable environment. Everyone has a unique contribution to make and all are welcome.*

title: Marketing Specialist
description:
**About Us**
Sophos is a worldwide leader and innovator of advanced cybersecurity solutions, including Managed Detection and Response (MDR) and incident response services and a broad portfolio of endpoint, network, email, and cloud security technologies that help organizations defeat cyberattacks. As one of the largest pure-play cybersecurity providers, Sophos defends more than 500,000 organizations and more than 100 million users globally from active adversaries, ransomware, phishing, malware, and more. Sophos’ services and products connect through its cloud-based Sophos Central management console and are powered by Sophos X-Ops, the company’s cross-domain threat intelligence unit. Sophos X-Ops intelligence optimizes the entire Sophos Adaptive Cybersecurity Ecosystem, which includes a centralized data lake that leverages a rich set of open APIs available to customers, partners, developers, and other cybersecurity and information technology vendors. Sophos provides cybersecurity-as-a-service to organizations needing fully managed, turnkey security solutions. Customers can also manage their cybersecurity directly with Sophos’ security operations platform or use a hybrid approach by supplementing their in-house teams with Sophos’ services, including threat hunting and remediation. Sophos sells through reseller partners and managed service providers (MSPs) worldwide. Sophos is headquartered in Oxford, U.K. More information is available at www.sophos.com. **Role Summary**  

We are looking for a Channel Marketing Specialist to join the Sophos EMEA Marketing team. This role will deliver channel to and through programs for our Middle East & Africa region as well as support one to many partner/distributor communications and projects across our broader EMEA regions as part of our Channel Marketing Team.  

As a Channel Marketing Specialist, you will plan, develop, implement, execute, and measure the results of marketing campaigns and programs targeted at Sophos’s large network of resellers and distributors. As part of a highly collaborative EMEA team you may at times be required to also extend your skills to support programs and activities targeted directly at end users for example attendance at tradeshows and events and ensuring demand generation activities are relevant and executed successfully through our channel.  

  

For this position we are seeking a motivated team-player who is an organized, result driven, creative marketer who has ideally already had the chance to work in a Channel Marketing role for a global B2B Technology company.
### **What you will do**

+ Deliver against Channel Marketing activities for the EMEA Emerging (Middle East & Africa) region as required to support the growth plan for the region and increase engagement with the channel.
+ Work with a set number of key strategic reseller partners to ensure an effective quarterly plan is in place to drive Sophos business.
+ Review results with these partners alongside local Sales and report back on key performance metrics and results, ensuring an adequate ROI for any MDF budget allocated.
+ Be the EMEA Emerging lead on MSP working with the MSP sales team in region help to plan and execute activities to drive the MSP business as required.
+ Where necessary work with our Channel Service Centre (CSC) to adapt corporate campaigns and provide co-branded versions for resellers, ensuring our channel is kept continually updated on marketing content available from Sophos.
+ Work as part of the wider EMEA Channel Marketing Team, supporting activities as directed by the Senior Marketing Manager, EMEA Channel to deliver effective ‘to channel’ communications. For example, newsletters, enablement activities, training and webinars targeted across multiple regions.
+ Drive our resellers to take advantage of ‘through channel’ marketing activity, examples being webinars, campaigns, and events. At times working on campaigns targeting distribution to help them to communicate to our resellers the benefits of Sophos and the support available to market our products.
+ Ensure our channel partners are aware of and using the full range of lead generation tools available to them via our Partner Portal, support the delivery of an annual ‘channel marketing event’ to advise our partners on best practice when marketing Sophos products.
+ Work with the global social media team as directed by the Senior Marketing Manager EMEA Channel to ensure appropriate content is shared locally to engage with resellers and distributors across our various social media platforms.
+ When required work closely with Regional Sales and the Senior Channel Marketing Manager, EMEA to build SPIFFs and promos that will drive business in focus areas. Create, promote, and track these incentives continually, adapting where necessary to meet business needs.
+ Track and report on all marketing spend across Emerging EMEA showing ROI and lessons learnt from each activity. Review MDF spend and make suggestions, based on partner revenue, on future marketing investments.
+ Budget management & campaign reporting manage the budget allocated for Partner MDF or projects you are asked to lead on ensuring an adequate ROI, ensure effective use of the MDF portal and manage claims where required.
+ Ensure timely review and reporting on your programs and initiatives completing QBR presentation decks and activity plans when required.
+ Occasionally you will be required to support marketing events within the EMEA region including Sophos hosted seminars, tradeshows and partner events and attend where necessary.
+ Work effectively as part of the Field Marketing team contributing to overall team success and suggesting improvements to maximise performance.

### **What you will bring**

+ Experience of B2B Marketing and MDF management in similar industry
+ Must have a track record of working proactively with sales and channel teams
+ Experience and desire to work in a dynamic, fast-paced, B2B growth organisation
+ Ability to implement and measure a marketing plan
+ Good understanding of and experience in all elements of the marketing mix
+ An aptitude for problem solving and analytical skills
+ Excellent written and verbal communication, and presentation skills
+ Project management skills and ability to work cross-functionally, with multiple global stakeholders
+ Ability to work independently and in a team environment
- 3-4 years’ minimum experience in a Marketing role

+ Complete understanding of Channel Marketing

#B1
#LI-Remote **Ready to Join Us?**
At Sophos, we believe in the power of diverse perspectives to fuel innovation. Research shows that candidates sometimes hesitate to apply if they don't check every box in a job description. We challenge that notion. Your unique experiences and skills might be exactly what we need to enhance our team. Don't let a checklist hold you back – we encourage you to apply. **What's Great About Sophos?*** Sophos operates a remote-first working model, making remote work the primary option for most employees. However, some roles may necessitate a hybrid approach. Please refer to the location details in our job postings for further information.
* Our people – we innovate and create, all of which are accompanied by a great sense of fun and team spirit
* Employee-led diversity and inclusion networks that build community and provide education and advocacy
* Annual charity and fundraising initiatives and volunteer days for employees to support local communities
* Global employee sustainability initiatives to reduce our environmental footprint
* Global fitness and trivia competitions to keep our bodies and minds sharp
* Global wellbeing days for employees to relax and recharge
* Monthly wellbeing webinars and training to support employee health and wellbeing

 **Our Commitment To You**
We’re proud of the diverse and inclusive environment we have at Sophos, and we’re committed to ensuring equality of opportunity. We believe that diversity, combined with excellence, builds a better Sophos, so we encourage applicants who can contribute to the diversity of our team. All applicants will be treated in a fair and equal manner and in accordance with the law regardless of gender, sex, gender reassignment, marital status, race, religion or belief, color, age, military veteran status, disability, pregnancy, maternity or sexual orientation. We want to give you every opportunity to show us your best self, so if there are any adjustments we could make to the recruitment and selection process to support you, please let us know. **Data Protection**
If you choose to explore an opportunity, and subsequently share your CV or other personal details with Sophos, these details will be held by Sophos for 12 months in accordance with our Privacy Policy and used by our recruitment team to contact you regarding this or other relevant opportunities at Sophos. If you would like Sophos to delete or update your details at any time, please follow the steps set out in the Privacy Policy describing your individual rights. If you have any questions about Sophos’ data protection practices, please contact dataprotection@sophos.com.

title: Content Manager
description:
As the Content Lead, you will be responsible for managing day-to-day content creation and developing content strategies that align with the company's business objectives. You will also manage a team of content writers and ensure all content is high-quality and meets brand standards.

Primary responsibilities include (but not limited to):

1. Develop and implement a holistic content strategy aligned with LogicLadder’s

marketing and business goals.

2. Lead and manage a team of content writers, providing clear direction, feedback, and

coaching for growth.

3. Define content requirements, assign projects, and ensure timely delivery of

high-quality content.

4. Create various content formats, including blog posts, articles, white papers, case

studies, ebooks, social media content, and more.

5. Develop thought leadership content that establishes LogicLadder as an industry expert

and builds brand authority.

6. Manage and optimize content workflow, utilizing project management tools and

processes.

7. Track and analyze content performance metrics, identifying areas for improvement and

optimization.

8. Stay up-to-date on content marketing trends and best practices, implementing

innovative strategies.

9. Collaborate with marketing, sales, and product teams to ensure content aligns with

overall business objectives.

10. Manage the content budget effectively and allocate resources strategically.

**Key Skills:**

1. Ability to develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy aligned with business

goals.

2. Ability to lead and inspire a team of content creators, editors, and other professionals.

3. Ability to organize and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.

4. Strong writing and editing skills to review and improve content produced by the team.

5. Understand various content formats and tailor the approach based on the platform

and audience.

6. Familiarity with SEO principles to optimize content for search engines and improve

visibility.

7. Clear and effective communication to convey ideas, guidelines, and feedback to the

content team.

8. Foster a creative environment for content ideation and development.

9. Think outside the box to create engaging and unique content.

10. Work collaboratively with marketing, design, and other teams to ensure cohesive

brand messaging.

**Qualifications: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Journalism, English, Communications, Business Management**

or a related field.

**Requirement**

1. Minimum 3-5 years of experience in content (long form) and copy writing in a

SaaS/B2B/IT/Technology environment.

2. Proven experience in deploying business-focused literature, from idea to execution.

3. Demonstrable writing and copy-editing skills for various formats relevant to the B2B

environment.

4. Expertise in researching from high-quality and authentic sources.

5. Familiarity with established and emerging technologies.

**Good to have :**

1. Understanding of content marketing principles to integrate content seamlessly into

marketing campaigns.

2. Familiarity with graphic design tools can be beneficial for collaboration with design

teams.

3. Understanding social media platforms and trends to tailor content for different

channels.

4. Knowledge of the customer journey and how content can impact each stage.

5. Building relationships with influencers, industry experts, and other content creators for

potential collaborations.

You are likely to succeed in this role if :

1. You are energetic, effective, a self-starter with good communication skills.

2. If you are passionate and enjoy working in a fast-paced and collaborative environment.

3. Goal-oriented and data-driven

4. Affable personality that blends well with an innovative and vibrant startup

environment

title: Outreach Manager
description:
Job Title: Public Relations and Outreach Manager

Company: ISBR Business School

About ISBR:

ISBR is a leading educational institution committed to providing quality education in business management and related fields. Our mission is to nurture young talent and prepare them for successful careers in the corporate world.

Position Overview:

ISBR is seeking a dynamic and experienced Public Relations and Outreach Manager to oversee all aspects of our public relations efforts and community outreach initiatives. The ideal candidate will be responsible for enhancing ISBR's brand image, building strong relationships with stakeholders, and increasing visibility through strategic communications and engagement activities.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Develop and implement comprehensive public relations strategies to promote ISBR's brand, programs, and initiatives to key stakeholders, including students, alumni, faculty, staff, media, and the broader community.

2. Cultivate and maintain positive relationships with media contacts, journalists, bloggers, and influencers to secure positive media coverage and generate publicity for ISBR.

3. Plan and execute media events, press conferences, interviews, and media briefings to communicate key messages and announcements effectively.

4. Create compelling content for press releases, articles, newsletters, social media posts, website updates, and other communication channels to engage audiences and enhance brand visibility.

5. Manage ISBR's social media presence, including content creation, posting schedules, community engagement, and monitoring of online conversations.

6. Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including admissions, marketing, alumni relations, and academic departments, to align PR and outreach efforts with organizational goals and objectives.

7. Monitor media coverage, track metrics, and analyze data to measure the effectiveness of PR campaigns and outreach initiatives and make recommendations for improvement.

8. Represent ISBR at industry conferences, networking events, and community forums to promote brand awareness and foster partnerships and collaborations.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in communications, public relations, marketing, or related field (Master's degree preferred).

- Proven experience in public relations, media relations, or corporate communications, preferably in the education sector.

- Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling messages and narratives for diverse audiences.

- Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships and networks with internal and external stakeholders.

- Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a results-oriented mindset and a focus on driving impact and outcomes.

- Proficiency in social media management tools, content management systems, and media monitoring platforms.

- Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

- Knowledge of industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in public relations and communications.

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹60,000.00 - ₹70,000.00 per month

* Are you fine with 6 days of working? What is your current package and Notice period?

title: Business Development Manager
description:
Experience- 5 years - 6 years  
We are seeking a highly skilled and dynamic Marketing and Business Development Manager to join our team at Metadrob. As the Marketing and Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing our marketing efforts while also driving business growth by expanding our customer base and creating new revenue streams. This role requires a strategic thinker with a strong background in marketing, business development, team management, and a proven ability to generate new orders and establish new verticals.  
Responsibilities:

Marketing Strategy and Execution:

* Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with the company's goals and objectives.
* Oversee all marketing activities, including SEO, SMO, PPC, content marketing, and social media campaigns.
* Collaborate with the marketing team to create compelling content and promotional materials that drive engagement and generate leads.
* Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics, optimize campaigns, and provide insights to enhance marketing effectiveness.

Business Development:

* Identify and target potential clients, build strategic partnerships, and generate new business opportunities.
* Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify customer needs, market trends, and new verticals for expansion.
* Lead the sales process from prospecting to closing, negotiating contracts, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
* Develop and maintain strong relationships with key clients, industry influencers, and partners to drive business growth.

Team Management and Cost Control:

* Manage and mentor a team of marketing and business development professionals, providing guidance and support to achieve team objectives.
* Set clear performance goals, conduct regular performance evaluations, and foster a collaborative and high-performing team culture.
* Monitor and control the cost of the marketing and business development activities, ensuring efficient resource allocation and ROI optimization.

Financial Analysis and Forecasting:

* Conduct financial analysis, track marketing and business development expenses, and prepare regular reports for management review.
* Collaborate with the finance team to develop accurate revenue forecasts and budgets for the marketing and business development department.

Requirements:

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's degree preferred).
* Proven experience (X+ years) in marketing management, business development, and team leadership.
* Strong knowledge and experience in marketing strategies, SEO, SMO, PPC, and digital marketing channels.
* Demonstrated track record of successful business development, including lead generation, client acquisition, and revenue growth.
* Excellent negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain strong client relationships.
* Strategic mindset with the ability to identify new market opportunities and drive business expansion.
* Strong financial acumen, with the ability to analyze financial data, control costs, and forecast revenue.
* Leadership skills with a proven ability to manage and inspire a diverse team.

Join us on this exciting journey of transforming the retail industry through cutting-edge technology. If you are a dynamic and results-oriented professional with expertise in marketing, business development, team management, and a passion for driving growth, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and help us take Metadrob to new heights!  
Note: Please include your portfolio or relevant work samples along with your application

description:

Sports Vertical

### **About us**


**Sportskeeda - For the hardcore sports fan**

  

Fans don't just follow the sport, they feel it - the pain, the passion, the guts, and the glory. When we at Sportskeeda look at sports fans we don't see a crowd; we see you. We're one of you, and we strive to keep you on top of every possible sports trend by creating engaging and insightful content at lightning-quick speed.

  

Established in 2009, Sportskeeda is a global sports content platform that covers the world's biggest sports and esports subjects and serves over 100 Million fans every month. Our passionate team comprises top content creators from around the world who produce hundreds of well-researched content pieces on a daily basis.

  

We are a Great Place to Work certified organization, with employees and contributors working from various corners of the globe.

* Help Manage several of Sportskeeda’s accounts, and media presence by producing

title: Operations Engineer
description:
Job Requisition ID #
24WD76436
Media Operations Engineer As a Media Operations Engineer on the Media Productions team at Autodesk, you will work closely with the team to ensure all production equipment is maintained and configured to meet the needs of all live events and meetings hosted by the company. Ensuring the overall health of our audio and video technologies will be critical to making our employees more productive by enabling them to connect in a rich and meaningful way. We are searching for a seasoned individual with a blend of technical depth and live event operation skills.
In this role you will report to the Manager of Media Productions, who is based in the Bay Area. The team provides the technology and IT support that makes our employees more productive including, but not limited to, video conferencing, live event support, video production, post production, digital signage, wayfinding kiosks, SaaS applications and integrations with Slack and other tools.
Responsibilities:* Responsible for the production of internal and external company events
* Operate multiple production roles (V1, A1, Encode, Content, Cameras, etc)
* Drive production quality standards of live streams, video calls and other live performances
* Work with vendors and IT to ensure smooth integration of AV solutions with other collaboration software
* Ensure technology in all event spaces and conference rooms is stable and up to date
* Responsible for troubleshooting and resolving issues related to AV hardware in conference room and event spaces
* Operate and maintain AV control room and other event space equipment
* Work closely with vendors and AV leadership to maintain AV technical stack and design
* Audit all AV and conference systems through sweeps, maintenance, tracking and dashboards
* Assist users in the operations of AV/VC hardware, software, applications and services
* Create documentation on common issues users experience
* Keep up to date on trends in technology and its application to understand how they can improve AV services
* Maintain asset information


Requirements:* 6+ years experience in a relevant technical role
* Knowledge of signal flow and AV technologies as it pertains to live event production and conferences, including control technologies, lighting, audio boards, video switchers, etc
* Understanding of broadcast production equipment including switchers, audio consoles, encoders, etc
* Experience using video conferencing and video sharing systems and technologies
* Great communicator: able to bridge between business stakeholders and technical implementers
* Experience in Audio DSPs (QSC,Biamp)
* High comfort level with installation and troubleshooting; quickly and efficiently determine root causes of system issues.
* A continuous learner with a demonstrated passion for AV technologies
* 20% - 30% travel may be required in the future


Desired:* BA/BS in Sound Engineering or relevant field
* Strong operational and technical skills
* Previous AV and live event/streaming experience
* Familiarity with Vimeo, VMix, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Poly as well as industry standard event production hardware
* Basic video editing skills (Adobe Premiere)
* Familiarity with component isolation and troubleshooting theory
* Experience with AV Builds/Construction a plus
